69#define GDK_COLOR_RGBA(color) \
70 ((guint32) (0xff | \
71 ((int)((color).red * 255) << 24) | \
72 ((int)((color).green * 255) << 16) | \
73 ((int)((color).blue * 255) << 8)))
74
75#define GDK_COLOR_RGB(color) \
76 ((guint32) (((int)((color).red * 255) << 16) | \
77 ((int)((color).green * 255) << 8) | \
78 ((int)((color).blue * 255))))
79
80#define DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT(s) memset ((s), 0xef, sizeof (*(s)))
81#define CLAMP_UCHAR(v) ((guchar) (CLAMP (((int)v), (int)0, (int)255)))
82#define INTENSITY(r, g, b) ((r) * 0.30 + (g) * 0.59 + (b) * 0.11)

99static cairo_surface_t *
100scale_surface (cairo_surface_t *surface,
101 gdouble old_width,
102 gdouble old_height,
103 gdouble new_width,
104 gdouble new_height,
105 gboolean vertical_stripes,
106 gboolean horizontal_stripes)
107{
108 gdouble scale_x;
109 gdouble scale_y;
110 cairo_content_t content;
111 gdouble width;
112 gdouble height;
113 cairo_surface_t *scaled;
114 cairo_t *cr;
115
116 scale_x = new_width / old_width;
117 scale_y = new_height / old_height;
118
119 if (horizontal_stripes && !vertical_stripes)
120 {
121 new_width = old_width;
122 scale_x = 1.0;
123 }
124 else if (vertical_stripes && !horizontal_stripes)
125 {
126 new_height = old_height;
127 scale_y = 1.0;
128 }
129
130 content = CAIRO_CONTENT_COLOR_ALPHA;
131 width = ceil (new_width);
132 height = ceil (new_height);
133
134 scaled = cairo_surface_create_similar (surface, content, (int) width, (int) height);
135 cr = cairo_create (scaled);
136
137 cairo_scale (cr, scale_x, scale_y);
138 cairo_set_source_surface (cr, surface, 0, 0);
139
140 cairo_pattern_set_extend (cairo_get_source (cr), CAIRO_EXTEND_PAD);
141
142 cairo_paint (cr);
143 cairo_destroy (cr);
144
145 return scaled;
146}
147
148static cairo_surface_t *
149get_surface_from_pixbuf (GdkPixbuf *pixbuf,
150 MetaImageFillType fill_type,
151 gdouble width,
152 gdouble height,
153 gboolean vertical_stripes,
154 gboolean horizontal_stripes)
155{
156 gdouble pixbuf_width;
157 gdouble pixbuf_height;
158 cairo_surface_t *surface;
159 cairo_content_t content;
160 cairo_surface_t *copy;
161 cairo_t *cr;
162
163 pixbuf_width = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf);
164 pixbuf_height = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (pixbuf);
165 surface = gdk_cairo_surface_create_from_pixbuf (pixbuf, 1, NULL);
166
167 if (pixbuf_width == width && pixbuf_height == height)
168 {
169 return surface;
170 }
171
172 if (fill_type != META_IMAGE_FILL_TILE)
173 {
174 cairo_surface_t *scaled;
175
176 scaled = scale_surface (surface, pixbuf_width, pixbuf_height,
177 width, height, vertical_stripes,
178 horizontal_stripes);
179
180 cairo_surface_destroy (surface);
181 surface = scaled;
182 }
183
184 content = CAIRO_CONTENT_COLOR_ALPHA;
185 width = ceil (width);
186 height = ceil (height);
187
188 copy = cairo_surface_create_similar (surface, content, (int) width, (int) height);
189 cr = cairo_create (copy);
190
191 cairo_set_source_surface (cr, surface, 0, 0);
192
193 if (fill_type == META_IMAGE_FILL_TILE ||
194 vertical_stripes || horizontal_stripes)
195 {
196 cairo_pattern_set_extend (cairo_get_source (cr), CAIRO_EXTEND_REPEAT);
197 }
198
199 cairo_paint (cr);
200 cairo_destroy (cr);
201
202 cairo_surface_destroy (surface);
203
204 return copy;
205}

207static GdkPixbuf *
208colorize_pixbuf (GdkPixbuf *orig,
209 GdkRGBA *new_color)
210{
211 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
212 double intensity;
213 int x, y;
214 const guchar *src;
215 guchar *dest;
216 int orig_rowstride;
217 int dest_rowstride;
218 int width, height;
219 gboolean has_alpha;
220 const guchar *src_pixels;
221 guchar *dest_pixels;
222
223 pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new (gdk_pixbuf_get_colorspace (orig), gdk_pixbuf_get_has_alpha (orig),
224 gdk_pixbuf_get_bits_per_sample (orig),
225 gdk_pixbuf_get_width (orig), gdk_pixbuf_get_height (orig));
226
227 if (pixbuf == NULL)
228 return NULL;
229
230 orig_rowstride = gdk_pixbuf_get_rowstride (orig);
231 dest_rowstride = gdk_pixbuf_get_rowstride (pixbuf);
232 width = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf);
233 height = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (pixbuf);
234 has_alpha = gdk_pixbuf_get_has_alpha (orig);
235 src_pixels = gdk_pixbuf_get_pixels (orig);
236 dest_pixels = gdk_pixbuf_get_pixels (pixbuf);
237
238 for (y = 0; y < height; y++)
239 {
240 src = src_pixels + y * orig_rowstride;
241 dest = dest_pixels + y * dest_rowstride;
242
243 for (x = 0; x < width; x++)
244 {
245 double dr, dg, db;
246
247 intensity = INTENSITY (src[0], src[1], src[2]) / 255.0;
248
249 if (intensity <= 0.5)
250 {
251 /* Go from black at intensity = 0.0 to new_color at intensity = 0.5 */
252 dr = new_color->red * intensity * 2.0;
253 dg = new_color->green * intensity * 2.0;
254 db = new_color->blue * intensity * 2.0;
255 }
256 else
257 {
258 /* Go from new_color at intensity = 0.5 to white at intensity = 1.0 */
259 dr = new_color->red + (1.0 - new_color->red) * (intensity - 0.5) * 2.0;
260 dg = new_color->green + (1.0 - new_color->green) * (intensity - 0.5) * 2.0;
261 db = new_color->blue + (1.0 - new_color->blue) * (intensity - 0.5) * 2.0;
262 }
263
264 dest[0] = CLAMP_UCHAR (255 * dr);
265 dest[1] = CLAMP_UCHAR (255 * dg);
266 dest[2] = CLAMP_UCHAR (255 * db);
267
268 if (has_alpha)
269 {
270 dest[3] = src[3];
271 src += 4;
272 dest += 4;
273 }
274 else
275 {
276 src += 3;
277 dest += 3;
278 }
279 }
280 }
281
282 return pixbuf;
283}
284
285static void
286color_composite (const GdkRGBA *bg,
287 const GdkRGBA *fg,
288 double alpha,
289 GdkRGBA *color)
290{
291 *color = *bg;
292 color->red = color->red + (fg->red - color->red) * alpha;
293 color->green = color->green + (fg->green - color->green) * alpha;
294 color->blue = color->blue + (fg->blue - color->blue) * alpha;
295}

302static void
303init_border (GtkBorder *border)
304{
305 border->top = -1;
306 border->bottom = -1;
307 border->left = -1;
308 border->right = -1;
309}
310
317MetaFrameLayout*
318meta_frame_layout_new (void)
319{
320 MetaFrameLayout *layout;
321
322 layout = g_new0 (MetaFrameLayout, 1);
323
324 layout->refcount = 1;
325
326 /* Fill with -1 values to detect invalid themes */
327 layout->left_width = -1;
328 layout->right_width = -1;
329 layout->bottom_height = -1;
330
331 layout->invisible_resize_border.left = 10;
332 layout->invisible_resize_border.right = 10;
333 layout->invisible_resize_border.bottom = 10;
334 layout->invisible_resize_border.top = 10;
335
336 init_border (&layout->title_border);
337
338 layout->title_vertical_pad = -1;
339
340 layout->right_titlebar_edge = -1;
341 layout->left_titlebar_edge = -1;
342
343 layout->button_sizing = META_BUTTON_SIZING_LAST;
344 layout->button_aspect = 1.0;
345 layout->button_width = -1;
346 layout->button_height = -1;
347
348 layout->has_title = TRUE;
349 layout->title_scale = 1.0;
350
351 init_border (&layout->button_border);
352
353 return layout;
354}
355
359static gboolean
360validate_border (const GtkBorder *border,
361 const char **bad)
362{
363 *bad = NULL;
364
365 if (border->top < 0)
366 *bad = _("top");
367 else if (border->bottom < 0)
368 *bad = _("bottom");
369 else if (border->left < 0)
370 *bad = _("left");
371 else if (border->right < 0)
372 *bad = _("right");
373
374 return *bad == NULL;
375}
376
390static gboolean
391validate_geometry_value (int val,
392 const char *name,
393 GError **error)
394{
395 if (val < 0)
396 {
397 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
398 META_THEME_ERROR_FRAME_GEOMETRY,
399 _("frame geometry does not specify \"%s\" dimension"),
400 name);
401 return FALSE;
402 }
403 else
404 return TRUE;
405}
406
407static gboolean
408validate_geometry_border (const GtkBorder *border,
409 const char *name,
410 GError **error)
411{
412 const char *bad;
413
414 if (!validate_border (border, &bad))
415 {
416 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
417 META_THEME_ERROR_FRAME_GEOMETRY,
418 _("frame geometry does not specify dimension \"%s\" for border \"%s\""),
419 bad, name);
420 return FALSE;
421 }
422 else
423 return TRUE;
424}
425
426gboolean
427meta_frame_layout_validate (const MetaFrameLayout *layout,
428 GError **error)
429{
430 g_return_val_if_fail (layout != NULL, FALSE);
431
432#define CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE(vname) if (!validate_geometry_value (layout->vname, #vname, error)) return FALSE
433
434#define CHECK_GEOMETRY_BORDER(bname) if (!validate_geometry_border (&layout->bname, #bname, error)) return FALSE
435
436 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (left_width);
437 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (right_width);
438 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (bottom_height);
439
440 CHECK_GEOMETRY_BORDER (title_border);
441
442 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (title_vertical_pad);
443
444 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (right_titlebar_edge);
445 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (left_titlebar_edge);
446
447 switch (layout->button_sizing)
448 {
449 case META_BUTTON_SIZING_ASPECT:
450 if (layout->button_aspect < (0.1) ||
451 layout->button_aspect > (15.0))
452 {
453 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
454 META_THEME_ERROR_FRAME_GEOMETRY,
455 _("Button aspect ratio %g is not reasonable"),
456 layout->button_aspect);
457 return FALSE;
458 }
459 break;
460 case META_BUTTON_SIZING_FIXED:
461 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (button_width);
462 CHECK_GEOMETRY_VALUE (button_height);
463 break;
464 case META_BUTTON_SIZING_LAST:
465 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
466 META_THEME_ERROR_FRAME_GEOMETRY,
467 _("Frame geometry does not specify size of buttons"));
468 return FALSE;
469 }
470
471 CHECK_GEOMETRY_BORDER (button_border);
472
473 return TRUE;
474}

476MetaFrameLayout*
477meta_frame_layout_copy (const MetaFrameLayout *src)
478{
479 MetaFrameLayout *layout;
480
481 layout = g_new0 (MetaFrameLayout, 1);
482
483 *layout = *src;
484
485 layout->refcount = 1;
486
487 return layout;
488}
489
490void
491meta_frame_layout_ref (MetaFrameLayout *layout)
492{
493 g_return_if_fail (layout != NULL);
494
495 layout->refcount += 1;
496}
497
498void
499meta_frame_layout_unref (MetaFrameLayout *layout)
500{
501 g_return_if_fail (layout != NULL);
502 g_return_if_fail (layout->refcount > 0);
503
504 layout->refcount -= 1;
505
506 if (layout->refcount == 0)
507 {
508 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (layout);
509 g_free (layout);
510 }
511}
512
513void
514meta_frame_layout_get_borders (const MetaFrameLayout *layout,
515 int text_height,
516 MetaFrameFlags flags,
517 MetaFrameType type,
518 MetaFrameBorders *borders)
519{
520 int buttons_height, title_height;
521
522 meta_frame_borders_clear (borders);
523
524 /* For a full-screen window, we don't have any borders, visible or not. */
525 if (flags & META_FRAME_FULLSCREEN)
526 return;
527
528 g_return_if_fail (layout != NULL);
529
530 if (!layout->has_title)
531 text_height = 0;
532
533 buttons_height = layout->button_height +
534 layout->button_border.top + layout->button_border.bottom;
535 title_height = text_height +
536 layout->title_vertical_pad +
537 layout->title_border.top + layout->title_border.bottom;
538
539 borders->visible.top = MAX (buttons_height, title_height);
540 borders->visible.left = layout->left_width;
541 borders->visible.right = layout->right_width;
542 borders->visible.bottom = layout->bottom_height;
543
544 borders->shadow.top = 0;
545 borders->shadow.left = 0;
546 borders->shadow.right = 0;
547 borders->shadow.bottom = 0;
548
549 if (flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_HORIZONTAL_RESIZE)
550 {
551 borders->resize.left = layout->invisible_resize_border.left;
552 borders->resize.right = layout->invisible_resize_border.right;
553 }
554
555 if (flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_VERTICAL_RESIZE)
556 {
557 borders->resize.bottom = layout->invisible_resize_border.bottom;
558
559 if (type != META_FRAME_TYPE_ATTACHED)
560 borders->resize.top = layout->invisible_resize_border.top;
561 }
562
563 borders->invisible.left = MAX (borders->shadow.left, borders->resize.left);
564 borders->invisible.right = MAX (borders->shadow.right, borders->resize.right);
565 borders->invisible.bottom = MAX (borders->shadow.bottom, borders->resize.bottom);
566 borders->invisible.top = MAX (borders->shadow.top, borders->resize.top);
567
568 /* Maximized and tiled windows should not have invisible borders on the sides
569 * that touch the screen edges */
570 if (flags & (META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED | META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT | META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT))
571 {
572 borders->invisible.top = 0;
573 borders->invisible.bottom = 0;
574 }
575 if (flags & (META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED | META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT))
576 borders->invisible.left = 0;
577 if (flags & (META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED | META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT))
578 borders->invisible.right = 0;
579
580 if (type == META_FRAME_TYPE_ATTACHED)
581 borders->invisible.top = 0;
582
583 borders->total.left = borders->invisible.left + borders->visible.left;
584 borders->total.right = borders->invisible.right + borders->visible.right;
585 borders->total.bottom = borders->invisible.bottom + borders->visible.bottom;
586 borders->total.top = borders->invisible.top + borders->visible.top;
587
588 if (flags & META_FRAME_SHADED)
589 borders->visible.bottom = borders->invisible.bottom = 0;
590}
591
592static MetaButtonType
593map_button_function_to_type (MetaButtonFunction function)
594{
595 switch (function)
596 {
597 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_SHADE:
598 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_SHADE;
599 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_ABOVE:
600 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_ABOVE;
601 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_STICK:
602 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_STICK;
603 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNSHADE:
604 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNSHADE;
605 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNABOVE:
606 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNABOVE;
607 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNSTICK:
608 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNSTICK;
609 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_MENU:
610 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_MENU;
611 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_APPMENU:
612 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_APPMENU;
613 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_MINIMIZE:
614 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_MINIMIZE;
615 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_MAXIMIZE:
616 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_MAXIMIZE;
617 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_CLOSE:
618 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_CLOSE;
619 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_LAST:
620 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST;
621 }
622
623 return META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST;
624}
625
626static MetaButtonSpace*
627rect_for_function (MetaFrameGeometry *fgeom,
628 MetaFrameFlags flags,
629 MetaButtonFunction function,
630 MetaTheme *theme)
631{
632
633 /* Firstly, check version-specific things. */
634
635 if (META_THEME_ALLOWS(theme, META_THEME_SHADE_STICK_ABOVE_BUTTONS))
636 {
637 switch (function)
638 {
639 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_SHADE:
640 if ((flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_SHADE) && !(flags & META_FRAME_SHADED))
641 return &fgeom->shade_rect;
642 else
643 return NULL;
644 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_ABOVE:
645 if (!(flags & META_FRAME_ABOVE))
646 return &fgeom->above_rect;
647 else
648 return NULL;
649 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_STICK:
650 if (!(flags & META_FRAME_STUCK))
651 return &fgeom->stick_rect;
652 else
653 return NULL;
654 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNSHADE:
655 if ((flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_SHADE) && (flags & META_FRAME_SHADED))
656 return &fgeom->unshade_rect;
657 else
658 return NULL;
659 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNABOVE:
660 if (flags & META_FRAME_ABOVE)
661 return &fgeom->unabove_rect;
662 else
663 return NULL;
664 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNSTICK:
665 if (flags & META_FRAME_STUCK)
666 return &fgeom->unstick_rect;
667 default:
668 /* just go on to the next switch block */;
669 }
670 }
671
672 /* now consider the buttons which exist in all versions */
673
674 switch (function)
675 {
676 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_MENU:
677 if (flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_MENU)
678 return &fgeom->menu_rect;
679 else
680 return NULL;
681 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_APPMENU:
682 if (flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_APPMENU)
683 return &fgeom->appmenu_rect;
684 else
685 return NULL;
686 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_MINIMIZE:
687 if (flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_MINIMIZE)
688 return &fgeom->min_rect;
689 else
690 return NULL;
691 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_MAXIMIZE:
692 if (flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_MAXIMIZE)
693 return &fgeom->max_rect;
694 else
695 return NULL;
696 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_CLOSE:
697 if (flags & META_FRAME_ALLOWS_DELETE)
698 return &fgeom->close_rect;
699 else
700 return NULL;
701 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_STICK:
702 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_SHADE:
703 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_ABOVE:
704 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNSTICK:
705 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNSHADE:
706 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_UNABOVE:
707 /* we are being asked for a >v1 button which hasn't been handled yet,
708 * so obviously we're not in a theme which supports that version.
709 * therefore, we don't show the button. return NULL and all will
710 * be well.
711 */
712 return NULL;
713
714 case META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_LAST:
715 return NULL;
716 }
717
718 return NULL;
719}
720
721static gboolean
722strip_button (MetaButtonSpace *func_rects[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER],
723 GdkRectangle *bg_rects[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER],
724 int *n_rects,
725 MetaButtonSpace *to_strip)
726{
727 int i;
728
729 i = 0;
730 while (i < *n_rects)
731 {
732 if (func_rects[i] == to_strip)
733 {
734 *n_rects -= 1;
735
736 /* shift the other rects back in the array */
737 while (i < *n_rects)
738 {
739 func_rects[i] = func_rects[i+1];
740 bg_rects[i] = bg_rects[i+1];
741
742 ++i;
743 }
744
745 func_rects[i] = NULL;
746 bg_rects[i] = NULL;
747
748 return TRUE;
749 }
750
751 ++i;
752 }
753
754 return FALSE; /* did not strip anything */
755}
756
757void
758meta_frame_layout_calc_geometry (const MetaFrameLayout *layout,
759 int text_height,
760 MetaFrameFlags flags,
761 int client_width,
762 int client_height,
763 const MetaButtonLayout *button_layout,
764 MetaFrameGeometry *fgeom,
765 MetaTheme *theme)
766{
767 int i, n_left, n_right, n_left_spacers, n_right_spacers;
768 int x;
769 int button_y;
770 int title_right_edge;
771 int width, height;
772 int button_width, button_height;
773 int min_size_for_rounding;
774
775 /* the left/right rects in order; the max # of rects
776 * is the number of button functions
777 */
778 MetaButtonSpace *left_func_rects[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER];
779 MetaButtonSpace *right_func_rects[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER];
780 GdkRectangle *left_bg_rects[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER];
781 gboolean left_buttons_has_spacer[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER];
782 GdkRectangle *right_bg_rects[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER];
783 gboolean right_buttons_has_spacer[MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER];
784
785 MetaFrameBorders borders;
786
787 meta_frame_layout_get_borders (layout, text_height,
788 flags,
789 META_FRAME_TYPE_NORMAL, /* Will be updated when type parameter is passed down */
790 &borders);
791
792 fgeom->borders = borders;
793
794 width = client_width + borders.total.left + borders.total.right;
795
796 height = ((flags & META_FRAME_SHADED) ? 0: client_height) +
797 borders.total.top + borders.total.bottom;
798
799 fgeom->width = width;
800 fgeom->height = height;
801
802 fgeom->top_titlebar_edge = layout->title_border.top;
803 fgeom->bottom_titlebar_edge = layout->title_border.bottom;
804 fgeom->left_titlebar_edge = layout->left_titlebar_edge;
805 fgeom->right_titlebar_edge = layout->right_titlebar_edge;
806
807 switch (layout->button_sizing)
808 {
809 case META_BUTTON_SIZING_ASPECT:
810 button_height = borders.visible.top - layout->button_border.top - layout->button_border.bottom;
811 button_width = (int) (((double) button_height) / layout->button_aspect);
812 break;
813 case META_BUTTON_SIZING_FIXED:
814 button_width = layout->button_width;
815 button_height = layout->button_height;
816 break;
817 case META_BUTTON_SIZING_LAST:
818 g_assert_not_reached ();
819 default:
820 button_width = -1;
821 button_height = -1;
822 }
823
824 /* FIXME all this code sort of pretends that duplicate buttons
825 * with the same function are allowed, but that breaks the
826 * code in frames.c, so isn't really allowed right now.
827 * Would need left_close_rect, right_close_rect, etc.
828 */
829
830 /* Init all button rects to 0, lame hack */
831 memset (ADDRESS_OF_BUTTON_RECTS (fgeom), '\0',
832 LENGTH_OF_BUTTON_RECTS);
833
834 n_left = 0;
835 n_right = 0;
836 n_left_spacers = 0;
837 n_right_spacers = 0;
838
839 if (!layout->hide_buttons)
840 {
841 /* Try to fill in rects */
842 for (i = 0; i < MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER && button_layout->left_buttons[i] != META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_LAST; i++)
843 {
844 left_func_rects[n_left] = rect_for_function (fgeom, flags,
845 button_layout->left_buttons[i],
846 theme);
847 if (left_func_rects[n_left] != NULL)
848 {
849 left_buttons_has_spacer[n_left] = button_layout->left_buttons_has_spacer[i];
850 if (button_layout->left_buttons_has_spacer[i])
851 ++n_left_spacers;
852
853 ++n_left;
854 }
855 }
856
857 for (i = 0; i < MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER && button_layout->right_buttons[i] != META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_LAST; i++)
858 {
859 right_func_rects[n_right] = rect_for_function (fgeom, flags,
860 button_layout->right_buttons[i],
861 theme);
862 if (right_func_rects[n_right] != NULL)
863 {
864 right_buttons_has_spacer[n_right] = button_layout->right_buttons_has_spacer[i];
865 if (button_layout->right_buttons_has_spacer[i])
866 ++n_right_spacers;
867
868 ++n_right;
869 }
870 }
871 }
872
873 for (i = 0; i < MAX_BUTTONS_PER_CORNER; i++)
874 {
875 left_bg_rects[i] = NULL;
876 right_bg_rects[i] = NULL;
877 }
878
879 for (i = 0; i < n_left; i++)
880 {
881 if (n_left == 1)
882 left_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->left_single_background;
883 else if (i == 0)
884 left_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->left_left_background;
885 else if (i == (n_left - 1))
886 left_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->left_right_background;
887 else
888 left_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->left_middle_backgrounds[i - 1];
889 }
890
891 for (i = 0; i < n_right; i++)
892 {
893 if (n_right == 1)
894 right_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->right_single_background;
895 else if (i == (n_right - 1))
896 right_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->right_right_background;
897 else if (i == 0)
898 right_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->right_left_background;
899 else
900 right_bg_rects[i] = &fgeom->right_middle_backgrounds[i - 1];
901 }
902
903 /* Be sure buttons fit */
904 while (n_left > 0 || n_right > 0)
905 {
906 int space_used_by_buttons;
907 int space_available;
908
909 space_available = fgeom->width - layout->left_titlebar_edge - layout->right_titlebar_edge;
910
911 space_used_by_buttons = 0;
912
913 space_used_by_buttons += button_width * n_left;
914 space_used_by_buttons += (int) (0.75 * (double) (button_width * n_left_spacers));
915 space_used_by_buttons += layout->button_border.left * n_left;
916 space_used_by_buttons += layout->button_border.right * n_left;
917
918 space_used_by_buttons += button_width * n_right;
919 space_used_by_buttons += (int) (0.75 * (double) (button_width * n_right_spacers));
920 space_used_by_buttons += layout->button_border.left * n_right;
921 space_used_by_buttons += layout->button_border.right * n_right;
922
923 if (space_used_by_buttons <= space_available)
924 break; /* Everything fits, bail out */
925
926 /* First try to remove separators */
927 if (n_left_spacers > 0)
928 {
929 left_buttons_has_spacer[--n_left_spacers] = FALSE;
930 continue;
931 }
932 else if (n_right_spacers > 0)
933 {
934 right_buttons_has_spacer[--n_right_spacers] = FALSE;
935 continue;
936 }
937
938 /* Otherwise we need to shave out a button. Shave
939 * above, stick, shade, min, max, close, then menu (menu is most useful);
940 * prefer the default button locations.
941 */
942 if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
943 &n_left, &fgeom->above_rect))
944 continue;
945 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
946 &n_right, &fgeom->above_rect))
947 continue;
948 else if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
949 &n_left, &fgeom->stick_rect))
950 continue;
951 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
952 &n_right, &fgeom->stick_rect))
953 continue;
954 else if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
955 &n_left, &fgeom->shade_rect))
956 continue;
957 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
958 &n_right, &fgeom->shade_rect))
959 continue;
960 else if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
961 &n_left, &fgeom->min_rect))
962 continue;
963 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
964 &n_right, &fgeom->min_rect))
965 continue;
966 else if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
967 &n_left, &fgeom->max_rect))
968 continue;
969 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
970 &n_right, &fgeom->max_rect))
971 continue;
972 else if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
973 &n_left, &fgeom->close_rect))
974 continue;
975 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
976 &n_right, &fgeom->close_rect))
977 continue;
978 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
979 &n_right, &fgeom->menu_rect))
980 continue;
981 else if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
982 &n_left, &fgeom->menu_rect))
983 continue;
984 else if (strip_button (right_func_rects, right_bg_rects,
985 &n_right, &fgeom->appmenu_rect))
986 continue;
987 else if (strip_button (left_func_rects, left_bg_rects,
988 &n_left, &fgeom->appmenu_rect))
989 continue;
990 else
991 {
992 meta_bug ("Could not find a button to strip. n_left = %d n_right = %d\n",
993 n_left, n_right);
994 }
995 }
996
997 /* Save the button layout */
998 fgeom->button_layout = *button_layout;
999 fgeom->n_left_buttons = n_left;
1000 fgeom->n_right_buttons = n_right;
1001
1002 /* center buttons vertically */
1003 button_y = (borders.visible.top -
1004 (button_height + layout->button_border.top + layout->button_border.bottom)) / 2 + layout->button_border.top + borders.invisible.top;
1005
1006 /* right edge of farthest-right button */
1007 x = width - layout->right_titlebar_edge - borders.invisible.right;
1008
1009 i = n_right - 1;
1010 while (i >= 0)
1011 {
1012 MetaButtonSpace *rect;
1013
1014 if (x < 0) /* if we go negative, leave the buttons we don't get to as 0-width */
1015 break;
1016
1017 rect = right_func_rects[i];
1018 rect->visible.x = x - layout->button_border.right - button_width;
1019 if (right_buttons_has_spacer[i])
1020 rect->visible.x -= (int) (0.75 * (double) button_width);
1021
1022 rect->visible.y = button_y;
1023 rect->visible.width = button_width;
1024 rect->visible.height = button_height;
1025
1026 if (flags & META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED ||
1027 flags & META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT ||
1028 flags & META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT)
1029 {
1030 rect->clickable.x = rect->visible.x;
1031 rect->clickable.y = rect->visible.y;
1032 rect->clickable.width = button_width;
1033 rect->clickable.height = button_height;
1034
1035 /* For the last right button on maximized/right-tiled windows, extend clickable area to the top-right edge (Fitts's law)*/
1036 if (i == n_right - 1 && (flags & META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED || flags & META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT))
1037 {
1038 rect->clickable.y = 0;
1039 rect->clickable.width += layout->right_titlebar_edge + layout->right_width + layout->button_border.right;
1040 rect->clickable.height = button_y + button_height;
1041 }
1042
1043 }
1044 else
1045 memmove (&(rect->clickable), &(rect->visible), sizeof(rect->clickable));
1046
1047 *(right_bg_rects[i]) = rect->visible;
1048
1049 x = rect->visible.x - layout->button_border.left;
1050
1051 --i;
1052 }
1053
1054 /* save right edge of titlebar for later use */
1055 title_right_edge = x - layout->title_border.right;
1056
1057 /* Now x changes to be position from the left and we go through
1058 * the left-side buttons
1059 */
1060 x = layout->left_titlebar_edge + borders.invisible.left;
1061 for (i = 0; i < n_left; i++)
1062 {
1063 MetaButtonSpace *rect;
1064
1065 rect = left_func_rects[i];
1066
1067 rect->visible.x = x + layout->button_border.left;
1068 rect->visible.y = button_y;
1069 rect->visible.width = button_width;
1070 rect->visible.height = button_height;
1071
1072 if (flags & META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED ||
1073 flags & META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT ||
1074 flags & META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT)
1075 {
1076 rect->clickable.x = rect->visible.x;
1077 rect->clickable.y = rect->visible.y;
1078 rect->clickable.width = button_width;
1079 rect->clickable.height = button_height;
1080
1081 /* For the first left button on maximized/left-tiled windows, extend clickable area to top-left corner (Fitts's law) */
1082 if (i == 0 && (flags & META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED || flags & META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT))
1083 {
1084 rect->clickable.x = 0;
1085 rect->clickable.y = 0;
1086 rect->clickable.width += layout->left_titlebar_edge + layout->left_width + layout->button_border.left;
1087 rect->clickable.height = button_y + button_height;
1088 }
1089 }
1090 else
1091 memmove (&(rect->clickable), &(rect->visible), sizeof(rect->clickable));
1092
1093 x = rect->visible.x + rect->visible.width + layout->button_border.right;
1094 if (left_buttons_has_spacer[i])
1095 x += (int) (0.75 * (double) button_width);
1096
1097 *(left_bg_rects[i]) = rect->visible;
1098 }
1099
1100 /* We always fill as much vertical space as possible with title rect,
1101 * rather than centering it like the buttons
1102 */
1103 fgeom->title_rect.x = x + layout->title_border.left;
1104 fgeom->title_rect.y = layout->title_border.top + borders.invisible.top;
1105 fgeom->title_rect.width = title_right_edge - fgeom->title_rect.x;
1106 fgeom->title_rect.height = borders.visible.top - layout->title_border.top - layout->title_border.bottom;
1107
1108 /* Nuke title if it won't fit */
1109 if (fgeom->title_rect.width < 0 ||
1110 fgeom->title_rect.height < 0)
1111 {
1112 fgeom->title_rect.width = 0;
1113 fgeom->title_rect.height = 0;
1114 }
1115
1116 if (flags & META_FRAME_SHADED)
1117 min_size_for_rounding = 0;
1118 else
1119 min_size_for_rounding = 5;
1120
1121 fgeom->top_left_corner_rounded_radius = 0;
1122 fgeom->top_right_corner_rounded_radius = 0;
1123 fgeom->bottom_left_corner_rounded_radius = 0;
1124 fgeom->bottom_right_corner_rounded_radius = 0;
1125
1126 if (borders.visible.top + borders.visible.left >= min_size_for_rounding)
1127 fgeom->top_left_corner_rounded_radius = layout->top_left_corner_rounded_radius;
1128 if (borders.visible.top + borders.visible.right >= min_size_for_rounding)
1129 fgeom->top_right_corner_rounded_radius = layout->top_right_corner_rounded_radius;
1130
1131 if (borders.visible.bottom + borders.visible.left >= min_size_for_rounding)
1132 fgeom->bottom_left_corner_rounded_radius = layout->bottom_left_corner_rounded_radius;
1133 if (borders.visible.bottom + borders.visible.right >= min_size_for_rounding)
1134 fgeom->bottom_right_corner_rounded_radius = layout->bottom_right_corner_rounded_radius;
1135}
1136
1137MetaGradientSpec*
1138meta_gradient_spec_new (MetaGradientType type)
1139{
1140 MetaGradientSpec *spec;
1141
1142 spec = g_new (MetaGradientSpec, 1);
1143
1144 spec->type = type;
1145 spec->color_specs = NULL;
1146
1147 return spec;
1148}
1149
1150static cairo_pattern_t *
1151create_cairo_pattern_from_gradient_spec (const MetaGradientSpec *spec,
1152 const MetaAlphaGradientSpec *alpha_spec,
1153 GtkStyleContext *context)
1154{
1155 gint n_colors;
1156 cairo_pattern_t *pattern;
1157 GSList *tmp;
1158 gint i;
1159
1160 n_colors = g_slist_length (spec->color_specs);
1161 if (n_colors == 0)
1162 return NULL;
1163
1164 if (alpha_spec != NULL && alpha_spec->n_alphas != 1)
1165 g_assert (n_colors == alpha_spec->n_alphas);
1166
1167 if (spec->type == META_GRADIENT_HORIZONTAL)
1168 pattern = cairo_pattern_create_linear (0, 0, 1, 0);
1169 else if (spec->type == META_GRADIENT_VERTICAL)
1170 pattern = cairo_pattern_create_linear (0, 0, 0, 1);
1171 else if (spec->type == META_GRADIENT_DIAGONAL)
1172 pattern = cairo_pattern_create_linear (0, 0, 1, 1);
1173 else
1174 g_assert_not_reached ();
1175
1176 i = 0;
1177 tmp = spec->color_specs;
1178 while (tmp != NULL)
1179 {
1180 GdkRGBA color;
1181
1182 meta_color_spec_render (tmp->data, context, &color);
1183
1184 if (alpha_spec != NULL)
1185 {
1186 gdouble alpha;
1187
1188 if (alpha_spec->n_alphas == 1)
1189 alpha = alpha_spec->alphas[0] / 255.0;
1190 else
1191 alpha = alpha_spec->alphas[i] / 255.0;
1192
1193 cairo_pattern_add_color_stop_rgba (pattern, i / (gfloat) (n_colors - 1),
1194 color.red, color.green, color.blue,
1195 alpha);
1196 }
1197 else
1198 cairo_pattern_add_color_stop_rgb (pattern, i / (gfloat) (n_colors - 1),
1199 color.red, color.green, color.blue);
1200
1201 tmp = tmp->next;
1202 ++i;
1203 }
1204
1205 if (cairo_pattern_status (pattern) != CAIRO_STATUS_SUCCESS)
1206 {
1207 cairo_pattern_destroy (pattern);
1208 return NULL;
1209 }
1210
1211 return pattern;
1212}
1213
1214static void
1215free_color_spec (gpointer spec, gpointer user_data)
1216{
1217 meta_color_spec_free (spec);
1218}
1219
1220void
1221meta_gradient_spec_free (MetaGradientSpec *spec)
1222{
1223 g_return_if_fail (spec != NULL);
1224
1225 g_slist_foreach (spec->color_specs, free_color_spec, NULL);
1226 g_slist_free (spec->color_specs);
1227
1228 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (spec);
1229 g_free (spec);
1230}
1231
1232void
1233meta_gradient_spec_render (const MetaGradientSpec *spec,
1234 const MetaAlphaGradientSpec *alpha_spec,
1235 cairo_t *cr,
1236 GtkStyleContext *context,
1237 gint x,
1238 gint y,
1239 gint width,
1240 gint height)
1241{
1242 cairo_pattern_t *pattern;
1243
1244 pattern = create_cairo_pattern_from_gradient_spec (spec, alpha_spec, context);
1245 if (pattern == NULL)
1246 return;
1247
1248 cairo_save (cr);
1249
1250 cairo_rectangle (cr, x, y, width, height);
1251
1252 cairo_translate (cr, x, y);
1253 cairo_scale (cr, width, height);
1254
1255 cairo_set_source (cr, pattern);
1256 cairo_fill (cr);
1257 cairo_pattern_destroy (pattern);
1258
1259 cairo_restore (cr);
1260}
1261
1262gboolean
1263meta_gradient_spec_validate (MetaGradientSpec *spec,
1264 GError **error)
1265{
1266 g_return_val_if_fail (spec != NULL, FALSE);
1267
1268 if (g_slist_length (spec->color_specs) < 2)
1269 {
1270 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
1271 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1272 _("Gradients should have at least two colors"));
1273 return FALSE;
1274 }
1275
1276 return TRUE;
1277}
1278
1279MetaAlphaGradientSpec*
1280meta_alpha_gradient_spec_new (MetaGradientType type,
1281 int n_alphas)
1282{
1283 MetaAlphaGradientSpec *spec;
1284
1285 g_return_val_if_fail (n_alphas > 0, NULL);
1286
1287 spec = g_new0 (MetaAlphaGradientSpec, 1);
1288
1289 spec->type = type;
1290 spec->alphas = g_new0 (unsigned char, n_alphas);
1291 spec->n_alphas = n_alphas;
1292
1293 return spec;
1294}
1295
1296void
1297meta_alpha_gradient_spec_free (MetaAlphaGradientSpec *spec)
1298{
1299 g_return_if_fail (spec != NULL);
1300
1301 g_free (spec->alphas);
1302 g_free (spec);
1303}
1304
1305cairo_pattern_t *
1306meta_alpha_gradient_spec_get_mask (const MetaAlphaGradientSpec *spec)
1307{
1308 gint n_alphas;
1309 cairo_pattern_t *pattern;
1310 gint i;
1311
1312 /* Hardcoded in theme-parser.c */
1313 g_assert (spec->type == META_GRADIENT_HORIZONTAL);
1314
1315 n_alphas = spec->n_alphas;
1316 if (n_alphas == 0)
1317 return NULL;
1318
1319 if (n_alphas == 1)
1320 return cairo_pattern_create_rgba (0, 0, 0, spec->alphas[0] / 255.0);
1321
1322 pattern = cairo_pattern_create_linear (0, 0, 1, 0);
1323
1324 for (i = 0; i < n_alphas; i++)
1325 cairo_pattern_add_color_stop_rgba (pattern, i / (gfloat) (n_alphas - 1),
1326 0, 0, 0, spec->alphas[i] / 255.0);
1327
1328 if (cairo_pattern_status (pattern) != CAIRO_STATUS_SUCCESS)
1329 {
1330 cairo_pattern_destroy (pattern);
1331 return NULL;
1332 }
1333
1334 return pattern;
1335}
1336
1337MetaColorSpec*
1338meta_color_spec_new (MetaColorSpecType type)
1339{
1340 MetaColorSpec *spec;
1341 MetaColorSpec dummy;
1342 int size;
1343
1344 size = G_STRUCT_OFFSET (MetaColorSpec, data);
1345
1346 switch (type)
1347 {
1348 case META_COLOR_SPEC_BASIC:
1349 size += sizeof (dummy.data.basic);
1350 break;
1351
1352 case META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK:
1353 size += sizeof (dummy.data.gtk);
1354 break;
1355
1356 case META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK_CUSTOM:
1357 size += sizeof (dummy.data.gtkcustom);
1358 break;
1359
1360 case META_COLOR_SPEC_BLEND:
1361 size += sizeof (dummy.data.blend);
1362 break;
1363
1364 case META_COLOR_SPEC_SHADE:
1365 size += sizeof (dummy.data.shade);
1366 break;
1367 }
1368
1369 spec = g_malloc0 (size);
1370
1371 spec->type = type;
1372
1373 return spec;
1374}
1375
1376void
1377meta_color_spec_free (MetaColorSpec *spec)
1378{
1379 g_return_if_fail (spec != NULL);
1380
1381 switch (spec->type)
1382 {
1383 case META_COLOR_SPEC_BASIC:
1384 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (&spec->data.basic);
1385 break;
1386
1387 case META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK:
1388 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (&spec->data.gtk);
1389 break;
1390
1391 case META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK_CUSTOM:
1392 if (spec->data.gtkcustom.color_name)
1393 g_free (spec->data.gtkcustom.color_name);
1394 if (spec->data.gtkcustom.fallback)
1395 meta_color_spec_free (spec->data.gtkcustom.fallback);
1396 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (&spec->data.gtkcustom);
1397 break;
1398
1399 case META_COLOR_SPEC_BLEND:
1400 if (spec->data.blend.foreground)
1401 meta_color_spec_free (spec->data.blend.foreground);
1402 if (spec->data.blend.background)
1403 meta_color_spec_free (spec->data.blend.background);
1404 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (&spec->data.blend);
1405 break;
1406
1407 case META_COLOR_SPEC_SHADE:
1408 if (spec->data.shade.base)
1409 meta_color_spec_free (spec->data.shade.base);
1410 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (&spec->data.shade);
1411 break;
1412 }
1413
1414 g_free (spec);
1415}
1416
1417MetaColorSpec*
1418meta_color_spec_new_from_string (const char *str,
1419 GError **err)
1420{
1421 MetaColorSpec *spec;
1422
1423 spec = NULL;
1424
1425 if (strncmp (str, "gtk:custom", 10) == 0)
1426 {
1427 const char *color_name_start, *fallback_str_start, *end;
1428 char *color_name;
1429 MetaColorSpec *fallback = NULL;
1430 static gboolean debug, debug_set = FALSE;
1431
1432 if (!debug_set)
1433 {
1434 debug = g_getenv ("MARCO_DISABLE_FALLBACK_COLOR") != NULL;
1435 debug_set = TRUE;
1436 }
1437
1438 if (str[10] != '(')
1439 {
1440 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1441 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1442 _("GTK custom color specification must have color name and fallback in parentheses, e.g. gtk:custom(foo,bar); could not parse \"%s\""),
1443 str);
1444 return NULL;
1445 }
1446
1447 color_name_start = str + 11;
1448
1449 fallback_str_start = color_name_start;
1450 while (*fallback_str_start && *fallback_str_start != ',')
1451 {
1452 if (!(g_ascii_isalnum (*fallback_str_start)
1453 || *fallback_str_start == '-'
1454 || *fallback_str_start == '_'))
1455 {
1456 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1457 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1458 _("Invalid character '%c' in color_name parameter of gtk:custom, only A-Za-z0-9-_ are valid"),
1459 *fallback_str_start);
1460 return NULL;
1461 }
1462 fallback_str_start++;
1463 }
1464 fallback_str_start++;
1465
1466 end = strrchr (str, ')');
1467
1468 if (color_name_start == NULL || fallback_str_start == NULL || end == NULL)
1469 {
1470 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1471 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1472 _("Gtk:custom format is \"gtk:custom(color_name,fallback)\", \"%s\" does not fit the format"),
1473 str);
1474 return NULL;
1475 }
1476
1477 if (!debug)
1478 {
1479 char *fallback_str;
1480 fallback_str = g_strndup (fallback_str_start,
1481 end - fallback_str_start);
1482 fallback = meta_color_spec_new_from_string (fallback_str, err);
1483 g_free (fallback_str);
1484 }
1485 else
1486 {
1487 fallback = meta_color_spec_new_from_string ("pink", err);
1488 }
1489
1490 if (fallback == NULL)
1491 return NULL;
1492
1493 color_name = g_strndup (color_name_start, fallback_str_start - color_name_start - 1);
1494
1495 spec = meta_color_spec_new (META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK_CUSTOM);
1496 spec->data.gtkcustom.color_name = color_name;
1497 spec->data.gtkcustom.fallback = fallback;
1498 }
1499 else if (strncmp (str, "gtk:", 4) == 0)
1500 {
1501 /* GTK color */
1502 const char *bracket;
1503 const char *end_bracket;
1504 char *tmp;
1505 GtkStateFlags state;
1506 MetaGtkColorComponent component;
1507
1508 bracket = str;
1509 while (*bracket && *bracket != '[')
1510 ++bracket;
1511
1512 if (*bracket == '\0')
1513 {
1514 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1515 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1516 _("GTK color specification must have the state in brackets, e.g. gtk:fg[NORMAL] where NORMAL is the state; could not parse \"%s\""),
1517 str);
1518 return NULL;
1519 }
1520
1521 end_bracket = bracket;
1522 ++end_bracket;
1523 while (*end_bracket && *end_bracket != ']')
1524 ++end_bracket;
1525
1526 if (*end_bracket == '\0')
1527 {
1528 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1529 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1530 _("GTK color specification must have a close bracket after the state, e.g. gtk:fg[NORMAL] where NORMAL is the state; could not parse \"%s\""),
1531 str);
1532 return NULL;
1533 }
1534
1535 tmp = g_strndup (bracket + 1, end_bracket - bracket - 1);
1536 state = meta_gtk_state_from_string (tmp);
1537 if (((int) state) == -1)
1538 {
1539 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1540 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1541 _("Did not understand state \"%s\" in color specification"),
1542 tmp);
1543 g_free (tmp);
1544 return NULL;
1545 }
1546 g_free (tmp);
1547
1548 tmp = g_strndup (str + 4, bracket - str - 4);
1549 component = meta_color_component_from_string (tmp);
1550 if (component == META_GTK_COLOR_LAST)
1551 {
1552 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1553 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1554 _("Did not understand color component \"%s\" in color specification"),
1555 tmp);
1556 g_free (tmp);
1557 return NULL;
1558 }
1559 g_free (tmp);
1560
1561 spec = meta_color_spec_new (META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK);
1562 spec->data.gtk.state = state;
1563 spec->data.gtk.component = component;
1564 g_assert (spec->data.gtk.component < META_GTK_COLOR_LAST);
1565 }
1566 else if (strncmp (str, "blend/", 6) == 0)
1567 {
1568 /* blend */
1569 char **split;
1570 double alpha;
1571 char *end;
1572 MetaColorSpec *fg;
1573 MetaColorSpec *bg;
1574
1575 split = g_strsplit (str, "/", 4);
1576
1577 if (split[0] == NULL || split[1] == NULL ||
1578 split[2] == NULL || split[3] == NULL)
1579 {
1580 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1581 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1582 _("Blend format is \"blend/bg_color/fg_color/alpha\", \"%s\" does not fit the format"),
1583 str);
1584 g_strfreev (split);
1585 return NULL;
1586 }
1587
1588 alpha = g_ascii_strtod (split[3], &end);
1589 if (end == split[3])
1590 {
1591 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1592 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1593 _("Could not parse alpha value \"%s\" in blended color"),
1594 split[3]);
1595 g_strfreev (split);
1596 return NULL;
1597 }
1598
1599 if (alpha < (0.0 - 1e6) || alpha > (1.0 + 1e6))
1600 {
1601 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1602 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1603 _("Alpha value \"%s\" in blended color is not between 0.0 and 1.0"),
1604 split[3]);
1605 g_strfreev (split);
1606 return NULL;
1607 }
1608
1609 fg = NULL;
1610 bg = NULL;
1611
1612 bg = meta_color_spec_new_from_string (split[1], err);
1613 if (bg == NULL)
1614 {
1615 g_strfreev (split);
1616 return NULL;
1617 }
1618
1619 fg = meta_color_spec_new_from_string (split[2], err);
1620 if (fg == NULL)
1621 {
1622 meta_color_spec_free (bg);
1623 g_strfreev (split);
1624 return NULL;
1625 }
1626
1627 g_strfreev (split);
1628
1629 spec = meta_color_spec_new (META_COLOR_SPEC_BLEND);
1630 spec->data.blend.alpha = alpha;
1631 spec->data.blend.background = bg;
1632 spec->data.blend.foreground = fg;
1633 }
1634 else if (strncmp (str, "shade/", 6) == 0)
1635 {
1636 /* shade */
1637 char **split;
1638 double factor;
1639 char *end;
1640 MetaColorSpec *base;
1641
1642 split = g_strsplit (str, "/", 3);
1643
1644 if (split[0] == NULL || split[1] == NULL ||
1645 split[2] == NULL)
1646 {
1647 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1648 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1649 _("Shade format is \"shade/base_color/factor\", \"%s\" does not fit the format"),
1650 str);
1651 g_strfreev (split);
1652 return NULL;
1653 }
1654
1655 factor = g_ascii_strtod (split[2], &end);
1656 if (end == split[2])
1657 {
1658 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1659 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1660 _("Could not parse shade factor \"%s\" in shaded color"),
1661 split[2]);
1662 g_strfreev (split);
1663 return NULL;
1664 }
1665
1666 if (factor < (0.0 - 1e6))
1667 {
1668 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1669 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1670 _("Shade factor \"%s\" in shaded color is negative"),
1671 split[2]);
1672 g_strfreev (split);
1673 return NULL;
1674 }
1675
1676 base = NULL;
1677
1678 base = meta_color_spec_new_from_string (split[1], err);
1679 if (base == NULL)
1680 {
1681 g_strfreev (split);
1682 return NULL;
1683 }
1684
1685 g_strfreev (split);
1686
1687 spec = meta_color_spec_new (META_COLOR_SPEC_SHADE);
1688 spec->data.shade.factor = factor;
1689 spec->data.shade.base = base;
1690 }
1691 else
1692 {
1693 spec = meta_color_spec_new (META_COLOR_SPEC_BASIC);
1694
1695 if (!gdk_rgba_parse (&spec->data.basic.color, str))
1696 {
1697 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
1698 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
1699 _("Could not parse color \"%s\""),
1700 str);
1701 meta_color_spec_free (spec);
1702 return NULL;
1703 }
1704 }
1705
1706 g_assert (spec);
1707
1708 return spec;
1709}
1710
1711MetaColorSpec*
1712meta_color_spec_new_gtk (MetaGtkColorComponent component,
1713 GtkStateFlags state)
1714{
1715 MetaColorSpec *spec;
1716
1717 spec = meta_color_spec_new (META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK);
1718
1719 spec->data.gtk.component = component;
1720 spec->data.gtk.state = state;
1721
1722 return spec;
1723}
1724
1725static void
1726get_background_color_real (GtkStyleContext *context,
1727 GtkStateFlags state,
1728 GdkRGBA *color)
1729{
1730 GdkRGBA *c;
1731
1732 g_return_if_fail (color != NULL);
1733 g_return_if_fail (GTK_IS_STYLE_CONTEXT (context));
1734
1735 gtk_style_context_get (context,
1736 state,
1737 "background-color", &c,
1738 NULL);
1739
1740 *color = *c;
1741 gdk_rgba_free (c);
1742}
1743
1744static void
1745get_background_color (GtkStyleContext *context,
1746 GtkStateFlags state,
1747 GdkRGBA *color)
1748{
1749 GdkRGBA empty = { 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 };
1750 GdkRGBA rgba;
1751
1752 get_background_color_real (context, state, &rgba);
1753
1754 if (gdk_rgba_equal (&rgba, &empty))
1755 {
1756 GtkWidget *toplevel;
1757 GtkStyleContext *tmp;
1758
1759 toplevel = gtk_window_new (GTK_WINDOW_TOPLEVEL);
1760 tmp = gtk_widget_get_style_context (toplevel);
1761
1762 get_background_color_real (tmp, state, &rgba);
1763
1764 gtk_widget_destroy (toplevel);
1765 }
1766
1767 *color = rgba;
1768}
1769
1770/* Based on set_color() in gtkstyle.c */
1771#define LIGHTNESS_MULT 1.3
1772#define DARKNESS_MULT 0.7
1773void
1774meta_gtk_style_get_light_color (GtkStyleContext *style,
1775 GtkStateFlags state,
1776 GdkRGBA *color)
1777{
1778 get_background_color (style, state, color);
1779 gtk_style_shade (color, color, LIGHTNESS_MULT);
1780}
1781
1782void
1783meta_gtk_style_get_dark_color (GtkStyleContext *style,
1784 GtkStateFlags state,
1785 GdkRGBA *color)
1786{
1787 get_background_color (style, state, color);
1788 gtk_style_shade (color, color, DARKNESS_MULT);
1789}
1790
1791static void
1792meta_set_color_from_style (GdkRGBA *color,
1793 GtkStyleContext *context,
1794 GtkStateFlags state,
1795 MetaGtkColorComponent component)
1796{
1797 GdkRGBA other;
1798
1799 /* Add background class to context to get the correct colors from the GTK+
1800 theme instead of white text over black background. */
1801 gtk_style_context_add_class (context, GTK_STYLE_CLASS_BACKGROUND);
1802
1803 switch (component)
1804 {
1805 case META_GTK_COLOR_BG:
1806 case META_GTK_COLOR_BASE:
1807 get_background_color (context, state, color);
1808 break;
1809 case META_GTK_COLOR_FG:
1810 case META_GTK_COLOR_TEXT:
1811 gtk_style_context_get_color (context, state, color);
1812 break;
1813 case META_GTK_COLOR_TEXT_AA:
1814 gtk_style_context_get_color (context, state, color);
1815 meta_set_color_from_style (&other, context, state, META_GTK_COLOR_BASE);
1816
1817 color->red = (color->red + other.red) / 2;
1818 color->green = (color->green + other.green) / 2;
1819 color->blue = (color->blue + other.blue) / 2;
1820 break;
1821 case META_GTK_COLOR_MID:
1822 meta_gtk_style_get_light_color (context, state, color);
1823 meta_gtk_style_get_dark_color (context, state, &other);
1824
1825 color->red = (color->red + other.red) / 2;
1826 color->green = (color->green + other.green) / 2;
1827 color->blue = (color->blue + other.blue) / 2;
1828 break;
1829 case META_GTK_COLOR_LIGHT:
1830 meta_gtk_style_get_light_color (context, state, color);
1831 break;
1832 case META_GTK_COLOR_DARK:
1833 meta_gtk_style_get_dark_color (context, state, color);
1834 break;
1835 case META_GTK_COLOR_LAST:
1836 g_assert_not_reached ();
1837 break;
1838 }
1839}
1840
1841static void
1842meta_set_custom_color_from_style (GdkRGBA *color,
1843 GtkStyleContext *context,
1844 char *color_name,
1845 MetaColorSpec *fallback)
1846{
1847 if (!gtk_style_context_lookup_color (context, color_name, color))
1848 meta_color_spec_render (fallback, context, color);
1849}
1850
1851void
1852meta_color_spec_render (MetaColorSpec *spec,
1853 GtkStyleContext *style,
1854 GdkRGBA *color)
1855{
1856 g_return_if_fail (spec != NULL);
1857
1858 g_return_if_fail (GTK_IS_STYLE_CONTEXT (style));
1859
1860 switch (spec->type)
1861 {
1862 case META_COLOR_SPEC_BASIC:
1863 *color = spec->data.basic.color;
1864 break;
1865
1866 case META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK:
1867 meta_set_color_from_style (color,
1868 style,
1869 spec->data.gtk.state,
1870 spec->data.gtk.component);
1871 break;
1872
1873 case META_COLOR_SPEC_GTK_CUSTOM:
1874 meta_set_custom_color_from_style (color,
1875 style,
1876 spec->data.gtkcustom.color_name,
1877 spec->data.gtkcustom.fallback);
1878 break;
1879
1880 case META_COLOR_SPEC_BLEND:
1881 {
1882 GdkRGBA bg, fg;
1883
1884 meta_color_spec_render (spec->data.blend.background, style, &bg);
1885 meta_color_spec_render (spec->data.blend.foreground, style, &fg);
1886
1887 color_composite (&bg, &fg, spec->data.blend.alpha,
1888 &spec->data.blend.color);
1889
1890 *color = spec->data.blend.color;
1891 }
1892 break;
1893
1894 case META_COLOR_SPEC_SHADE:
1895 {
1896 meta_color_spec_render (spec->data.shade.base, style,
1897 &spec->data.shade.color);
1898
1899 gtk_style_shade (&spec->data.shade.color,
1900 &spec->data.shade.color, spec->data.shade.factor);
1901
1902 *color = spec->data.shade.color;
1903 }
1904 break;
1905 }
1906}
1907
1914static const char*
1915op_name (PosOperatorType type)
1916{
1917 switch (type)
1918 {
1919 case POS_OP_ADD:
1920 return "+";
1921 case POS_OP_SUBTRACT:
1922 return "-";
1923 case POS_OP_MULTIPLY:
1924 return "*";
1925 case POS_OP_DIVIDE:
1926 return "/";
1927 case POS_OP_MOD:
1928 return "%";
1929 case POS_OP_MAX:
1930 return "`max`";
1931 case POS_OP_MIN:
1932 return "`min`";
1933 case POS_OP_NONE:
1934 break;
1935 }
1936
1937 return "<unknown>";
1938}
1939
1948static PosOperatorType
1949op_from_string (const char *p,
1950 int *len)
1951{
1952 *len = 0;
1953
1954 switch (*p)
1955 {
1956 case '+':
1957 *len = 1;
1958 return POS_OP_ADD;
1959 case '-':
1960 *len = 1;
1961 return POS_OP_SUBTRACT;
1962 case '*':
1963 *len = 1;
1964 return POS_OP_MULTIPLY;
1965 case '/':
1966 *len = 1;
1967 return POS_OP_DIVIDE;
1968 case '%':
1969 *len = 1;
1970 return POS_OP_MOD;
1971
1972 case '`':
1973 if (strncmp (p, "`max`", 5) == 0)
1974 {
1975 *len = 5;
1976 return POS_OP_MAX;
1977 }
1978 else if (strncmp (p, "`min`", 5) == 0)
1979 {
1980 *len = 5;
1981 return POS_OP_MIN;
1982 }
1983 }
1984
1985 return POS_OP_NONE;
1986}
1987
1995static void
1996free_tokens (PosToken *tokens,
1997 int n_tokens)
1998{
1999 int i;
2000
2001 /* n_tokens can be 0 since tokens may have been allocated more than
2002 * it was initialized
2003 */
2004
2005 for (i = 0; i < n_tokens; i++)
2006 if (tokens[i].type == POS_TOKEN_VARIABLE)
2007 g_free (tokens[i].d.v.name);
2008
2009 g_free (tokens);
2010}
2011
2028static gboolean
2029parse_number (const char *p,
2030 const char **end_return,
2031 PosToken *next,
2032 GError **err)
2033{
2034 const char *start = p;
2035 char *end;
2036 gboolean is_float;
2037 char *num_str;
2038
2039 while (*p && (*p == '.' || g_ascii_isdigit (*p)))
2040 ++p;
2041
2042 if (p == start)
2043 {
2044 char buf[7] = { '\0' };
2045 buf[g_unichar_to_utf8 (g_utf8_get_char (p), buf)] = '\0';
2046 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2047 META_THEME_ERROR_BAD_CHARACTER,
2048 _("Coordinate expression contains character '%s' which is not allowed"),
2049 buf);
2050 return FALSE;
2051 }
2052
2053 *end_return = p;
2054
2055 /* we need this to exclude floats like "1e6" */
2056 num_str = g_strndup (start, p - start);
2057 start = num_str;
2058 is_float = FALSE;
2059 while (*start)
2060 {
2061 if (*start == '.')
2062 is_float = TRUE;
2063 ++start;
2064 }
2065
2066 if (is_float)
2067 {
2068 next->type = POS_TOKEN_DOUBLE;
2069 next->d.d.val = g_ascii_strtod (num_str, &end);
2070
2071 if (end == num_str)
2072 {
2073 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2074 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2075 _("Coordinate expression contains floating point number '%s' which could not be parsed"),
2076 num_str);
2077 g_free (num_str);
2078 return FALSE;
2079 }
2080 }
2081 else
2082 {
2083 next->type = POS_TOKEN_INT;
2084 next->d.i.val = strtol (num_str, &end, 10);
2085 if (end == num_str)
2086 {
2087 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2088 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2089 _("Coordinate expression contains integer '%s' which could not be parsed"),
2090 num_str);
2091 g_free (num_str);
2092 return FALSE;
2093 }
2094 }
2095
2096 g_free (num_str);
2097
2098 g_assert (next->type == POS_TOKEN_INT || next->type == POS_TOKEN_DOUBLE);
2099
2100 return TRUE;
2101}
2102
2106#define IS_VARIABLE_CHAR(c) (g_ascii_isalpha ((c)) || (c) == '_')
2107
2108#if 0
2109static void
2110debug_print_tokens (PosToken *tokens,
2111 int n_tokens)
2112{
2113 int i;
2114
2115 for (i = 0; i < n_tokens; i++)
2116 {
2117 PosToken *t = &tokens[i];
2118
2119 g_print (" ");
2120
2121 switch (t->type)
2122 {
2123 case POS_TOKEN_INT:
2124 g_print ("\"%d\"", t->d.i.val);
2125 break;
2126 case POS_TOKEN_DOUBLE:
2127 g_print ("\"%g\"", t->d.d.val);
2128 break;
2129 case POS_TOKEN_OPEN_PAREN:
2130 g_print ("\"(\"");
2131 break;
2132 case POS_TOKEN_CLOSE_PAREN:
2133 g_print ("\")\"");
2134 break;
2135 case POS_TOKEN_VARIABLE:
2136 g_print ("\"%s\"", t->d.v.name);
2137 break;
2138 case POS_TOKEN_OPERATOR:
2139 g_print ("\"%s\"", op_name (t->d.o.op));
2140 break;
2141 }
2142 }
2143
2144 g_print ("\n");
2145}

2147
2160static gboolean
2161pos_tokenize (const char *expr,
2162 PosToken **tokens_p,
2163 int *n_tokens_p,
2164 GError **err)
2165{
2166 PosToken *tokens;
2167 int n_tokens;
2168 int allocated;
2169 const char *p;
2170
2171 *tokens_p = NULL;
2172 *n_tokens_p = 0;
2173
2174 allocated = 3;
2175 n_tokens = 0;
2176 tokens = g_new (PosToken, allocated);
2177
2178 p = expr;
2179 while (*p)
2180 {
2181 PosToken *next;
2182 int len;
2183
2184 if (n_tokens == allocated)
2185 {
2186 allocated *= 2;
2187 tokens = g_renew (PosToken, tokens, allocated);
2188 }
2189
2190 next = &tokens[n_tokens];
2191
2192 switch (*p)
2193 {
2194 case '*':
2195 case '/':
2196 case '+':
2197 case '-': /* negative numbers aren't allowed so this is easy */
2198 case '%':
2199 case '`':
2200 next->type = POS_TOKEN_OPERATOR;
2201 next->d.o.op = op_from_string (p, &len);
2202 if (next->d.o.op != POS_OP_NONE)
2203 {
2204 ++n_tokens;
2205 p = p + (len - 1); /* -1 since we ++p later */
2206 }
2207 else
2208 {
2209 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2210 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2211 _("Coordinate expression contained unknown operator at the start of this text: \"%s\""),
2212 p);
2213
2214 goto error;
2215 }
2216 break;
2217
2218 case '(':
2219 next->type = POS_TOKEN_OPEN_PAREN;
2220 ++n_tokens;
2221 break;
2222
2223 case ')':
2224 next->type = POS_TOKEN_CLOSE_PAREN;
2225 ++n_tokens;
2226 break;
2227
2228 case ' ':
2229 case '\t':
2230 case '\n':
2231 break;
2232
2233 default:
2234 if (IS_VARIABLE_CHAR (*p))
2235 {
2236 /* Assume variable */
2237 const char *start = p;
2238 while (*p && IS_VARIABLE_CHAR (*p))
2239 ++p;
2240 g_assert (p != start);
2241 next->type = POS_TOKEN_VARIABLE;
2242 next->d.v.name = g_strndup (start, p - start);
2243 ++n_tokens;
2244 --p; /* since we ++p again at the end of while loop */
2245 }
2246 else
2247 {
2248 /* Assume number */
2249 const char *end;
2250
2251 if (!parse_number (p, &end, next, err))
2252 goto error;
2253
2254 ++n_tokens;
2255 p = end - 1; /* -1 since we ++p again at the end of while loop */
2256 }
2257
2258 break;
2259 }
2260
2261 ++p;
2262 }
2263
2264 if (n_tokens == 0)
2265 {
2266 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2267 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2268 _("Coordinate expression was empty or not understood"));
2269
2270 goto error;
2271 }
2272
2273 *tokens_p = tokens;
2274 *n_tokens_p = n_tokens;
2275
2276 return TRUE;
2277
2278 error:
2279 g_assert (err == NULL || *err != NULL);
2280
2281 free_tokens (tokens, n_tokens);
2282 return FALSE;
2283}
2284
2289typedef enum
2290{
2291 POS_EXPR_INT,
2292 POS_EXPR_DOUBLE,
2293 POS_EXPR_OPERATOR
2294} PosExprType;
2295
2306typedef struct
2307{
2308 PosExprType type;
2309 union
2310 {
2311 double double_val;
2312 int int_val;
2313 char operator;
2314 } d;
2315} PosExpr;
2316
2317#if 0
2318static void
2319debug_print_exprs (PosExpr *exprs,
2320 int n_exprs)
2321{
2322 int i;
2323
2324 for (i = 0; i < n_exprs; i++)
2325 {
2326 switch (exprs[i].type)
2327 {
2328 case POS_EXPR_INT:
2329 g_print (" %d", exprs[i].d.int_val);
2330 break;
2331 case POS_EXPR_DOUBLE:
2332 g_print (" %g", exprs[i].d.double_val);
2333 break;
2334 case POS_EXPR_OPERATOR:
2335 g_print (" %s", op_name (exprs[i].d.operator));
2336 break;
2337 }
2338 }
2339 g_print ("\n");
2340}
2341#endif
2342
2343static gboolean
2344do_operation (PosExpr *a,
2345 PosExpr *b,
2346 PosOperatorType op,
2347 GError **err)
2348{
2349 /* Promote types to double if required */
2350 if (a->type == POS_EXPR_DOUBLE ||
2351 b->type == POS_EXPR_DOUBLE)
2352 {
2353 if (a->type != POS_EXPR_DOUBLE)
2354 {
2355 a->type = POS_EXPR_DOUBLE;
2356 a->d.double_val = a->d.int_val;
2357 }
2358 if (b->type != POS_EXPR_DOUBLE)
2359 {
2360 b->type = POS_EXPR_DOUBLE;
2361 b->d.double_val = b->d.int_val;
2362 }
2363 }
2364
2365 g_assert (a->type == b->type);
2366
2367 if (a->type == POS_EXPR_INT)
2368 {
2369 switch (op)
2370 {
2371 case POS_OP_MULTIPLY:
2372 a->d.int_val = a->d.int_val * b->d.int_val;
2373 break;
2374 case POS_OP_DIVIDE:
2375 if (b->d.int_val == 0)
2376 {
2377 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2378 META_THEME_ERROR_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO,
2379 _("Coordinate expression results in division by zero"));
2380 return FALSE;
2381 }
2382 a->d.int_val = a->d.int_val / b->d.int_val;
2383 break;
2384 case POS_OP_MOD:
2385 if (b->d.int_val == 0)
2386 {
2387 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2388 META_THEME_ERROR_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO,
2389 _("Coordinate expression results in division by zero"));
2390 return FALSE;
2391 }
2392 a->d.int_val = a->d.int_val % b->d.int_val;
2393 break;
2394 case POS_OP_ADD:
2395 a->d.int_val = a->d.int_val + b->d.int_val;
2396 break;
2397 case POS_OP_SUBTRACT:
2398 a->d.int_val = a->d.int_val - b->d.int_val;
2399 break;
2400 case POS_OP_MAX:
2401 a->d.int_val = MAX (a->d.int_val, b->d.int_val);
2402 break;
2403 case POS_OP_MIN:
2404 a->d.int_val = MIN (a->d.int_val, b->d.int_val);
2405 break;
2406 case POS_OP_NONE:
2407 g_assert_not_reached ();
2408 break;
2409 }
2410 }
2411 else if (a->type == POS_EXPR_DOUBLE)
2412 {
2413 switch (op)
2414 {
2415 case POS_OP_MULTIPLY:
2416 a->d.double_val = a->d.double_val * b->d.double_val;
2417 break;
2418 case POS_OP_DIVIDE:
2419 if (b->d.double_val == 0.0)
2420 {
2421 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2422 META_THEME_ERROR_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO,
2423 _("Coordinate expression results in division by zero"));
2424 return FALSE;
2425 }
2426 a->d.double_val = a->d.double_val / b->d.double_val;
2427 break;
2428 case POS_OP_MOD:
2429 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2430 META_THEME_ERROR_MOD_ON_FLOAT,
2431 _("Coordinate expression tries to use mod operator on a floating-point number"));
2432 return FALSE;
2433 case POS_OP_ADD:
2434 a->d.double_val = a->d.double_val + b->d.double_val;
2435 break;
2436 case POS_OP_SUBTRACT:
2437 a->d.double_val = a->d.double_val - b->d.double_val;
2438 break;
2439 case POS_OP_MAX:
2440 a->d.double_val = MAX (a->d.double_val, b->d.double_val);
2441 break;
2442 case POS_OP_MIN:
2443 a->d.double_val = MIN (a->d.double_val, b->d.double_val);
2444 break;
2445 case POS_OP_NONE:
2446 g_assert_not_reached ();
2447 break;
2448 }
2449 }
2450 else
2451 g_assert_not_reached ();
2452
2453 return TRUE;
2454}
2455
2456static gboolean
2457do_operations (PosExpr *exprs,
2458 int *n_exprs,
2459 int precedence,
2460 GError **err)
2461{
2462 int i;
2463
2464#if 0
2465 g_print ("Doing prec %d ops on %d exprs\n", precedence, *n_exprs);
2466 debug_print_exprs (exprs, *n_exprs);
2467#endif
2468
2469 i = 1;
2470 while (i < *n_exprs)
2471 {
2472 gboolean compress;
2473
2474 /* exprs[i-1] first operand
2475 * exprs[i] operator
2476 * exprs[i+1] second operand
2477 *
2478 * we replace first operand with result of mul/div/mod,
2479 * or skip over operator and second operand if we have
2480 * an add/subtract
2481 */
2482
2483 if (exprs[i-1].type == POS_EXPR_OPERATOR)
2484 {
2485 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2486 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2487 _("Coordinate expression has an operator \"%s\" where an operand was expected"),
2488 op_name (exprs[i-1].d.operator));
2489 return FALSE;
2490 }
2491
2492 if (exprs[i].type != POS_EXPR_OPERATOR)
2493 {
2494 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2495 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2496 _("Coordinate expression had an operand where an operator was expected"));
2497 return FALSE;
2498 }
2499
2500 if (i == (*n_exprs - 1))
2501 {
2502 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2503 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2504 _("Coordinate expression ended with an operator instead of an operand"));
2505 return FALSE;
2506 }
2507
2508 g_assert ((i+1) < *n_exprs);
2509
2510 if (exprs[i+1].type == POS_EXPR_OPERATOR)
2511 {
2512 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2513 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2514 _("Coordinate expression has operator \"%c\" following operator \"%c\" with no operand in between"),
2515 exprs[i+1].d.operator,
2516 exprs[i].d.operator);
2517 return FALSE;
2518 }
2519
2520 compress = FALSE;
2521
2522 switch (precedence)
2523 {
2524 case 2:
2525 switch (exprs[i].d.operator)
2526 {
2527 case POS_OP_DIVIDE:
2528 case POS_OP_MOD:
2529 case POS_OP_MULTIPLY:
2530 compress = TRUE;
2531 if (!do_operation (&exprs[i-1], &exprs[i+1],
2532 exprs[i].d.operator,
2533 err))
2534 return FALSE;
2535 break;
2536 }
2537 break;
2538 case 1:
2539 switch (exprs[i].d.operator)
2540 {
2541 case POS_OP_ADD:
2542 case POS_OP_SUBTRACT:
2543 compress = TRUE;
2544 if (!do_operation (&exprs[i-1], &exprs[i+1],
2545 exprs[i].d.operator,
2546 err))
2547 return FALSE;
2548 break;
2549 }
2550 break;
2551 /* I have no rationale at all for making these low-precedence */
2552 case 0:
2553 switch (exprs[i].d.operator)
2554 {
2555 case POS_OP_MAX:
2556 case POS_OP_MIN:
2557 compress = TRUE;
2558 if (!do_operation (&exprs[i-1], &exprs[i+1],
2559 exprs[i].d.operator,
2560 err))
2561 return FALSE;
2562 break;
2563 }
2564 break;
2565 }
2566
2567 if (compress)
2568 {
2569 /* exprs[i-1] first operand (now result)
2570 * exprs[i] operator
2571 * exprs[i+1] second operand
2572 * exprs[i+2] new operator
2573 *
2574 * we move new operator just after first operand
2575 */
2576 if ((i+2) < *n_exprs)
2577 {
2578 memmove (&exprs[i], &exprs[i+2],
2579 sizeof (PosExpr) * (*n_exprs - i - 2));
2580 }
2581
2582 *n_exprs -= 2;
2583 }
2584 else
2585 {
2586 /* Skip operator and next operand */
2587 i += 2;
2588 }
2589 }
2590
2591 return TRUE;
2592}
2593
2619static gboolean
2620pos_eval_get_variable (PosToken *t,
2621 int *result,
2622 const MetaPositionExprEnv *env,
2623 GError **err)
2624{
2625 if (env->theme)
2626 {
2627 if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_width)
2628 *result = env->rect.width;
2629 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_height)
2630 *result = env->rect.height;
2631 else if (env->object_width >= 0 &&
2632 t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_object_width)
2633 *result = env->object_width;
2634 else if (env->object_height >= 0 &&
2635 t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_object_height)
2636 *result = env->object_height;
2637 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_left_width)
2638 *result = env->left_width;
2639 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_right_width)
2640 *result = env->right_width;
2641 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_top_height)
2642 *result = env->top_height;
2643 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_bottom_height)
2644 *result = env->bottom_height;
2645 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_mini_icon_width)
2646 *result = env->mini_icon_width;
2647 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_mini_icon_height)
2648 *result = env->mini_icon_height;
2649 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_icon_width)
2650 *result = env->icon_width;
2651 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_icon_height)
2652 *result = env->icon_height;
2653 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_title_width)
2654 *result = env->title_width;
2655 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_title_height)
2656 *result = env->title_height;
2657 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_frame_x_center)
2658 *result = env->frame_x_center;
2659 else if (t->d.v.name_quark == env->theme->quark_frame_y_center)
2660 *result = env->frame_y_center;
2661 else
2662 {
2663 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2664 META_THEME_ERROR_UNKNOWN_VARIABLE,
2665 _("Coordinate expression had unknown variable or constant \"%s\""),
2666 t->d.v.name);
2667 return FALSE;
2668 }
2669 }
2670 else
2671 {
2672 if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "width") == 0)
2673 *result = env->rect.width;
2674 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "height") == 0)
2675 *result = env->rect.height;
2676 else if (env->object_width >= 0 &&
2677 strcmp (t->d.v.name, "object_width") == 0)
2678 *result = env->object_width;
2679 else if (env->object_height >= 0 &&
2680 strcmp (t->d.v.name, "object_height") == 0)
2681 *result = env->object_height;
2682 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "left_width") == 0)
2683 *result = env->left_width;
2684 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "right_width") == 0)
2685 *result = env->right_width;
2686 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "top_height") == 0)
2687 *result = env->top_height;
2688 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "bottom_height") == 0)
2689 *result = env->bottom_height;
2690 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "mini_icon_width") == 0)
2691 *result = env->mini_icon_width;
2692 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "mini_icon_height") == 0)
2693 *result = env->mini_icon_height;
2694 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "icon_width") == 0)
2695 *result = env->icon_width;
2696 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "icon_height") == 0)
2697 *result = env->icon_height;
2698 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "title_width") == 0)
2699 *result = env->title_width;
2700 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "title_height") == 0)
2701 *result = env->title_height;
2702 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "frame_x_center") == 0)
2703 *result = env->frame_x_center;
2704 else if (strcmp (t->d.v.name, "frame_y_center") == 0)
2705 *result = env->frame_y_center;
2706 else
2707 {
2708 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2709 META_THEME_ERROR_UNKNOWN_VARIABLE,
2710 _("Coordinate expression had unknown variable or constant \"%s\""),
2711 t->d.v.name);
2712 return FALSE;
2713 }
2714 }
2715
2716 return TRUE;
2717}
2718
2733static gboolean
2734pos_eval_helper (PosToken *tokens,
2735 int n_tokens,
2736 const MetaPositionExprEnv *env,
2737 PosExpr *result,
2738 GError **err)
2739{
2740 /* Lazy-ass hardcoded limit on number of terms in expression */
2741#define MAX_EXPRS 32
2742 int paren_level;
2743 int first_paren;
2744 int i;
2745 PosExpr exprs[MAX_EXPRS];
2746 int n_exprs;
2747 int precedence;
2748
2749 /* Our first goal is to get a list of PosExpr, essentially
2750 * substituting variables and handling parentheses.
2751 */
2752
2753 first_paren = 0;
2754 paren_level = 0;
2755 n_exprs = 0;
2756 for (i = 0; i < n_tokens; i++)
2757 {
2758 PosToken *t = &tokens[i];
2759
2760 if (n_exprs >= MAX_EXPRS)
2761 {
2762 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2763 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2764 _("Coordinate expression parser overflowed its buffer."));
2765 return FALSE;
2766 }
2767
2768 if (paren_level == 0)
2769 {
2770 switch (t->type)
2771 {
2772 case POS_TOKEN_INT:
2773 exprs[n_exprs].type = POS_EXPR_INT;
2774 exprs[n_exprs].d.int_val = t->d.i.val;
2775 ++n_exprs;
2776 break;
2777
2778 case POS_TOKEN_DOUBLE:
2779 exprs[n_exprs].type = POS_EXPR_DOUBLE;
2780 exprs[n_exprs].d.double_val = t->d.d.val;
2781 ++n_exprs;
2782 break;
2783
2784 case POS_TOKEN_OPEN_PAREN:
2785 ++paren_level;
2786 if (paren_level == 1)
2787 first_paren = i;
2788 break;
2789
2790 case POS_TOKEN_CLOSE_PAREN:
2791 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2792 META_THEME_ERROR_BAD_PARENS,
2793 _("Coordinate expression had a close parenthesis with no open parenthesis"));
2794 return FALSE;
2795
2796 case POS_TOKEN_VARIABLE:
2797 exprs[n_exprs].type = POS_EXPR_INT;
2798
2799 /* FIXME we should just dump all this crap
2800 * in a hash, maybe keep width/height out
2801 * for optimization purposes
2802 */
2803 if (!pos_eval_get_variable (t, &exprs[n_exprs].d.int_val, env, err))
2804 return FALSE;
2805
2806 ++n_exprs;
2807 break;
2808
2809 case POS_TOKEN_OPERATOR:
2810 exprs[n_exprs].type = POS_EXPR_OPERATOR;
2811 exprs[n_exprs].d.operator = t->d.o.op;
2812 ++n_exprs;
2813 break;
2814 }
2815 }
2816 else
2817 {
2818 g_assert (paren_level > 0);
2819
2820 switch (t->type)
2821 {
2822 case POS_TOKEN_INT:
2823 case POS_TOKEN_DOUBLE:
2824 case POS_TOKEN_VARIABLE:
2825 case POS_TOKEN_OPERATOR:
2826 break;
2827
2828 case POS_TOKEN_OPEN_PAREN:
2829 ++paren_level;
2830 break;
2831
2832 case POS_TOKEN_CLOSE_PAREN:
2833 if (paren_level == 1)
2834 {
2835 /* We closed a toplevel paren group, so recurse */
2836 if (!pos_eval_helper (&tokens[first_paren+1],
2837 i - first_paren - 1,
2838 env,
2839 &exprs[n_exprs],
2840 err))
2841 return FALSE;
2842
2843 ++n_exprs;
2844 }
2845
2846 --paren_level;
2847 break;
2848
2849 }
2850 }
2851 }
2852
2853 if (paren_level > 0)
2854 {
2855 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2856 META_THEME_ERROR_BAD_PARENS,
2857 _("Coordinate expression had an open parenthesis with no close parenthesis"));
2858 return FALSE;
2859 }
2860
2861 /* Now we have no parens and no vars; so we just do all the multiplies
2862 * and divides, then all the add and subtract.
2863 */
2864 if (n_exprs == 0)
2865 {
2866 g_set_error (err, META_THEME_ERROR,
2867 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
2868 _("Coordinate expression doesn't seem to have any operators or operands"));
2869 return FALSE;
2870 }
2871
2872 /* precedence 1 ops */
2873 precedence = 2;
2874 while (precedence >= 0)
2875 {
2876 if (!do_operations (exprs, &n_exprs, precedence, err))
2877 return FALSE;
2878 --precedence;
2879 }
2880
2881 g_assert (n_exprs == 1);
2882
2883 *result = *exprs;
2884
2885 return TRUE;
2886}
2887
2888/*
2889 * expr = int | double | expr * expr | expr / expr |
2890 * expr + expr | expr - expr | (expr)
2891 *
2892 * so very not worth fooling with bison, yet so very painful by hand.
2893 */
2910static gboolean
2911pos_eval (MetaDrawSpec *spec,
2912 const MetaPositionExprEnv *env,
2913 int *val_p,
2914 GError **err)
2915{
2916 PosExpr expr;
2917
2918 *val_p = 0;
2919
2920 if (pos_eval_helper (spec->tokens, spec->n_tokens, env, &expr, err))
2921 {
2922 switch (expr.type)
2923 {
2924 case POS_EXPR_INT:
2925 *val_p = expr.d.int_val;
2926 break;
2927 case POS_EXPR_DOUBLE:
2928 *val_p = (int) expr.d.double_val;
2929 break;
2930 case POS_EXPR_OPERATOR:
2931 g_assert_not_reached ();
2932 break;
2933 }
2934 return TRUE;
2935 }
2936 else
2937 {
2938 return FALSE;
2939 }
2940}
2941
2942/* We always return both X and Y, but only one will be meaningful in
2943 * most contexts.
2944 */
2945
2946gboolean
2947meta_parse_position_expression (MetaDrawSpec *spec,
2948 const MetaPositionExprEnv *env,
2949 int *x_return,
2950 int *y_return,
2951 GError **err)
2952{
2953 /* All positions are in a coordinate system with x, y at the origin.
2954 * The expression can have -, +, *, / as operators, floating point
2955 * or integer constants, and the variables "width" and "height" and
2956 * optionally "object_width" and object_height". Negative numbers
2957 * aren't allowed.
2958 */
2959 int val;
2960
2961 if (spec->constant)
2962 val = spec->value;
2963 else
2964 {
2965 if (!pos_eval (spec, env, &spec->value, err))
2966 {
2967 g_assert (err == NULL || *err != NULL);
2968 return FALSE;
2969 }
2970
2971 val = spec->value;
2972 }
2973
2974 if (x_return)
2975 *x_return = env->rect.x + val;
2976 if (y_return)
2977 *y_return = env->rect.y + val;
2978
2979 return TRUE;
2980}
2981
2982gboolean
2983meta_parse_size_expression (MetaDrawSpec *spec,
2984 const MetaPositionExprEnv *env,
2985 int *val_return,
2986 GError **err)
2987{
2988 int val;
2989
2990 if (spec->constant)
2991 val = spec->value;
2992 else
2993 {
2994 if (!pos_eval (spec, env, &spec->value, err))
2995 {
2996 g_assert (err == NULL || *err != NULL);
2997 return FALSE;
2998 }
2999
3000 val = spec->value;
3001 }
3002
3003 if (val_return)
3004 *val_return = MAX (val, 1); /* require that sizes be at least 1x1 */
3005
3006 return TRUE;
3007}
3008
3009/* To do this we tokenize, replace variable tokens
3010 * that are constants, then reassemble. The purpose
3011 * here is to optimize expressions so we don't do hash
3012 * lookups to eval them. Obviously it's a tradeoff that
3013 * slows down theme load times.
3014 */
3015gboolean
3016meta_theme_replace_constants (MetaTheme *theme,
3017 PosToken *tokens,
3018 int n_tokens,
3019 GError **err)
3020{
3021 int i;
3022 double dval;
3023 int ival;
3024 gboolean is_constant = TRUE;
3025
3026 /* Loop through tokenized string looking for variables to replace */
3027 for (i = 0; i < n_tokens; i++)
3028 {
3029 PosToken *t = &tokens[i];
3030
3031 if (t->type == POS_TOKEN_VARIABLE)
3032 {
3033 if (meta_theme_lookup_int_constant (theme, t->d.v.name, &ival))
3034 {
3035 g_free (t->d.v.name);
3036 t->type = POS_TOKEN_INT;
3037 t->d.i.val = ival;
3038 }
3039 else if (meta_theme_lookup_float_constant (theme, t->d.v.name, &dval))
3040 {
3041 g_free (t->d.v.name);
3042 t->type = POS_TOKEN_DOUBLE;
3043 t->d.d.val = dval;
3044 }
3045 else
3046 {
3047 /* If we've found a variable that cannot be replaced then the
3048 expression is not a constant expression and we want to
3049 replace it with a GQuark */
3050
3051 t->d.v.name_quark = g_quark_from_string (t->d.v.name);
3052 is_constant = FALSE;
3053 }
3054 }
3055 }
3056
3057 return is_constant;
3058}
3059
3060static int
3061parse_x_position_unchecked (MetaDrawSpec *spec,
3062 const MetaPositionExprEnv *env)
3063{
3064 int retval;
3065 GError *error;
3066
3067 retval = 0;
3068 error = NULL;
3069 if (!meta_parse_position_expression (spec, env, &retval, NULL, &error))
3070 {
3071 meta_warning (_("Theme contained an expression that resulted in an error: %s\n"),
3072 error->message);
3073
3074 g_error_free (error);
3075 }
3076
3077 return retval;
3078}

3120void
3121meta_draw_spec_free (MetaDrawSpec *spec)
3122{

3127
3128MetaDrawSpec *
3129meta_draw_spec_new (MetaTheme *theme,
3130 const char *expr,
3131 GError **error)
3132{
3133 MetaDrawSpec *spec;
3134
3135 spec = g_slice_new0 (MetaDrawSpec);
3136
3137 pos_tokenize (expr, &spec->tokens, &spec->n_tokens, NULL);
3138
3139 spec->constant = meta_theme_replace_constants (theme, spec->tokens,
3140 spec->n_tokens, NULL);
3141 if (spec->constant)
3142 {
3143 if (!pos_eval (spec, NULL, &spec->value, error))
3144 {
3145 meta_draw_spec_free (spec);
3146 return NULL;
3147 }
3148 }
3149
3150 return spec;
3151}

3231 switch (op->type)
3232 {
3233 case META_DRAW_LINE:
3234 if (op->data.line.color_spec)

3249 meta_draw_spec_free (op->data.rectangle.width);
3250 meta_draw_spec_free (op->data.rectangle.height);
3251 break;
