3382
3383static GdkPixbuf*
3384apply_alpha (GdkPixbuf *pixbuf,
3385 MetaAlphaGradientSpec *spec,
3386 gboolean force_copy)
3387{
3388 GdkPixbuf *new_pixbuf;
3389 gboolean needs_alpha;
3390
3391 g_return_val_if_fail (GDK_IS_PIXBUF (pixbuf), NULL);
3392
3393 needs_alpha = spec && (spec->n_alphas > 1 ||
3394 spec->alphas[0] != 0xff);
3395
3396 if (!needs_alpha)
3397 return pixbuf;
3398
3399 if (!gdk_pixbuf_get_has_alpha (pixbuf))
3400 {
3401 new_pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_add_alpha (pixbuf, FALSE, 0, 0, 0);
3402 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (pixbuf));
3403 pixbuf = new_pixbuf;
3404 }
3405 else if (force_copy)
3406 {
3407 new_pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_copy (pixbuf);
3408 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (pixbuf));
3409 pixbuf = new_pixbuf;
3410 }
3411
3412 g_assert (gdk_pixbuf_get_has_alpha (pixbuf));
3413
3414 meta_gradient_add_alpha (pixbuf, spec->alphas, spec->n_alphas, spec->type);
3415
3416 return pixbuf;
3417}
3418
3419static GdkPixbuf*
3420pixbuf_tile (GdkPixbuf *tile,
3421 int width,
3422 int height)
3423{
3424 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
3425 int tile_width;
3426 int tile_height;
3427 int i, j;
3428
3429 tile_width = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (tile);
3430 tile_height = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (tile);
3431
3432 pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new (GDK_COLORSPACE_RGB,
3433 gdk_pixbuf_get_has_alpha (tile),
3434 8, width, height);
3435
3436 i = 0;
3437 while (i < width)
3438 {
3439 j = 0;
3440 while (j < height)
3441 {
3442 int w, h;
3443
3444 w = MIN (tile_width, width - i);
3445 h = MIN (tile_height, height - j);
3446
3447 gdk_pixbuf_copy_area (tile,
3448 0, 0,
3449 w, h,
3450 pixbuf,
3451 i, j);
3452
3453 j += tile_height;
3454 }
3455
3456 i += tile_width;
3457 }
3458
3459 return pixbuf;
3460}
3461
3462static GdkPixbuf *
3463replicate_rows (GdkPixbuf *src,
3464 int src_x,
3465 int src_y,
3466 int width,
3467 int height)
3468{
3469 unsigned int n_channels = gdk_pixbuf_get_n_channels (src);
3470 unsigned int src_rowstride = gdk_pixbuf_get_rowstride (src);
3471 unsigned char *pixels = (gdk_pixbuf_get_pixels (src) + src_y * src_rowstride + src_x
3472 * n_channels);
3473 unsigned char *dest_pixels;
3474 GdkPixbuf *result;
3475 unsigned int dest_rowstride;
3476 int i;
3477
3478 result = gdk_pixbuf_new (GDK_COLORSPACE_RGB, n_channels == 4, 8,
3479 width, height);
3480 dest_rowstride = gdk_pixbuf_get_rowstride (result);
3481 dest_pixels = gdk_pixbuf_get_pixels (result);
3482
3483 for (i = 0; i < height; i++)
3484 memcpy (dest_pixels + dest_rowstride * i, pixels, n_channels * width);
3485
3486 return result;
3487}
3488
3489static GdkPixbuf *
3490replicate_cols (GdkPixbuf *src,
3491 int src_x,
3492 int src_y,
3493 int width,
3494 int height)
3495{
3496 unsigned int n_channels = gdk_pixbuf_get_n_channels (src);
3497 unsigned int src_rowstride = gdk_pixbuf_get_rowstride (src);
3498 unsigned char *pixels = (gdk_pixbuf_get_pixels (src) + src_y * src_rowstride + src_x
3499 * n_channels);
3500 unsigned char *dest_pixels;
3501 GdkPixbuf *result;
3502 unsigned int dest_rowstride;
3503 int i, j;
3504
3505 result = gdk_pixbuf_new (GDK_COLORSPACE_RGB, n_channels == 4, 8,
3506 width, height);
3507 dest_rowstride = gdk_pixbuf_get_rowstride (result);
3508 dest_pixels = gdk_pixbuf_get_pixels (result);
3509
3510 for (i = 0; i < height; i++)
3511 {
3512 unsigned char *p = dest_pixels + dest_rowstride * i;
3513 unsigned char *q = pixels + src_rowstride * i;
3514
3515 unsigned char r = *(q++);
3516 unsigned char g = *(q++);
3517 unsigned char b = *(q++);
3518
3519 if (n_channels == 4)
3520 {
3521 unsigned char a;
3522
3523 a = *(q++);
3524
3525 for (j = 0; j < width; j++)
3526 {
3527 *(p++) = r;
3528 *(p++) = g;
3529 *(p++) = b;
3530 *(p++) = a;
3531 }
3532 }
3533 else
3534 {
3535 for (j = 0; j < width; j++)
3536 {
3537 *(p++) = r;
3538 *(p++) = g;
3539 *(p++) = b;
3540 }
3541 }
3542 }
3543
3544 return result;
3545}
3546
3547static GdkPixbuf*
3548scale_and_alpha_pixbuf (GdkPixbuf *src,
3549 MetaAlphaGradientSpec *alpha_spec,
3550 MetaImageFillType fill_type,
3551 int width,
3552 int height,
3553 gboolean vertical_stripes,
3554 gboolean horizontal_stripes)
3555{
3556 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
3557 GdkPixbuf *temp_pixbuf;
3558
3559 pixbuf = NULL;
3560
3561 pixbuf = src;
3562
3563 if (gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf) == width &&
3564 gdk_pixbuf_get_height (pixbuf) == height)
3565 {
3566 g_object_ref (G_OBJECT (pixbuf));
3567 }
3568 else
3569 {
3570 if (fill_type == META_IMAGE_FILL_TILE)
3571 {
3572 pixbuf = pixbuf_tile (pixbuf, width, height);
3573 }
3574 else
3575 {
3576 int src_h, src_w, dest_h, dest_w;
3577 src_h = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (src);
3578 src_w = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (src);
3579
3580 /* prefer to replicate_cols if possible, as that
3581 * is faster (no memory reads)
3582 */
3583 if (horizontal_stripes)
3584 {
3585 dest_w = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (src);
3586 dest_h = height;
3587 }
3588 else if (vertical_stripes)
3589 {
3590 dest_w = width;
3591 dest_h = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (src);
3592 }
3593
3594 else
3595 {
3596 dest_w = width;
3597 dest_h = height;
3598 }
3599
3600 if (dest_w == src_w && dest_h == src_h)
3601 {
3602 temp_pixbuf = src;
3603 g_object_ref (G_OBJECT (temp_pixbuf));
3604 }
3605 else
3606 {
3607 temp_pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_scale_simple (src,
3608 dest_w, dest_h,
3609 GDK_INTERP_BILINEAR);
3610 }
3611
3612 /* prefer to replicate_cols if possible, as that
3613 * is faster (no memory reads)
3614 */
3615 if (horizontal_stripes)
3616 {
3617 pixbuf = replicate_cols (temp_pixbuf, 0, 0, width, height);
3618 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (temp_pixbuf));
3619 }
3620 else if (vertical_stripes)
3621 {
3622 pixbuf = replicate_rows (temp_pixbuf, 0, 0, width, height);
3623 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (temp_pixbuf));
3624 }
3625 else
3626 {
3627 pixbuf = temp_pixbuf;
3628 }
3629 }
3630 }
3631
3632 if (pixbuf)
3633 pixbuf = apply_alpha (pixbuf, alpha_spec, pixbuf == src);
3634
3635 return pixbuf;
3636}
3637
3638static GdkPixbuf*
3639draw_op_as_pixbuf (const MetaDrawOp *op,
3640 GtkStyleContext *style,
3641 const MetaDrawInfo *info,
3642 int width,
3643 int height)
3644{
3645 /* Try to get the op as a pixbuf, assuming w/h in the op
3646 * matches the width/height passed in. return NULL
3647 * if the op can't be converted to an equivalent pixbuf.
3648 */
3649 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
3650
3651 pixbuf = NULL;
3652
3653 switch (op->type)
3654 {
3655 case META_DRAW_LINE:
3656 break;
3657
3658 case META_DRAW_RECTANGLE:
3659 if (op->data.rectangle.filled)
3660 {
3661 GdkRGBA color;
3662
3663 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.rectangle.color_spec,
3664 style,
3665 &color);
3666
3667 pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new (GDK_COLORSPACE_RGB,
3668 FALSE,
3669 8, width, height);
3670
3671 gdk_pixbuf_fill (pixbuf, GDK_COLOR_RGBA (color));
3672 }
3673 break;
3674
3675 case META_DRAW_ARC:
3676 break;
3677
3678 case META_DRAW_CLIP:
3679 break;
3680
3681 case META_DRAW_TINT:
3682 {
3683 GdkRGBA color;
3684 guint32 rgba;
3685 gboolean has_alpha;
3686
3687 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.rectangle.color_spec,
3688 style,
3689 &color);
3690
3691 has_alpha =
3692 op->data.tint.alpha_spec &&
3693 (op->data.tint.alpha_spec->n_alphas > 1 ||
3694 op->data.tint.alpha_spec->alphas[0] != 0xff);
3695
3696 pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new (GDK_COLORSPACE_RGB,
3697 has_alpha,
3698 8, width, height);
3699
3700 if (!has_alpha)
3701 {
3702 rgba = GDK_COLOR_RGBA (color);
3703
3704 gdk_pixbuf_fill (pixbuf, rgba);
3705 }
3706 else if (op->data.tint.alpha_spec->n_alphas == 1)
3707 {
3708 rgba = GDK_COLOR_RGBA (color);
3709 rgba &= ~0xff;
3710 rgba |= op->data.tint.alpha_spec->alphas[0];
3711
3712 gdk_pixbuf_fill (pixbuf, rgba);
3713 }
3714 else
3715 {
3716 rgba = GDK_COLOR_RGBA (color);
3717
3718 gdk_pixbuf_fill (pixbuf, rgba);
3719
3720 meta_gradient_add_alpha (pixbuf,
3721 op->data.tint.alpha_spec->alphas,
3722 op->data.tint.alpha_spec->n_alphas,
3723 op->data.tint.alpha_spec->type);
3724 }
3725 }
3726 break;
3727
3728 case META_DRAW_IMAGE:
3729 {
3730 if (op->data.image.colorize_spec)
3731 {
3732 GdkRGBA color;
3733
3734 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.image.colorize_spec,
3735 style, &color);
3736
3737 if (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf == NULL ||
3738 op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixel != GDK_COLOR_RGB (color))
3739 {
3740 if (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf)
3741 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf));
3742
3743 /* const cast here */
3744 ((MetaDrawOp*)op)->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf =
3745 colorize_pixbuf (op->data.image.pixbuf,
3746 &color);
3747 ((MetaDrawOp*)op)->data.image.colorize_cache_pixel =
3748 GDK_COLOR_RGB (color);
3749 }
3750
3751 if (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf)
3752 {
3753 pixbuf = scale_and_alpha_pixbuf (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf,
3754 op->data.image.alpha_spec,
3755 op->data.image.fill_type,
3756 width, height,
3757 op->data.image.vertical_stripes,
3758 op->data.image.horizontal_stripes);
3759 }
3760 }
3761 else
3762 {
3763 pixbuf = scale_and_alpha_pixbuf (op->data.image.pixbuf,
3764 op->data.image.alpha_spec,
3765 op->data.image.fill_type,
3766 width, height,
3767 op->data.image.vertical_stripes,
3768 op->data.image.horizontal_stripes);
3769 }
3770 break;
3771 }
3772
3773 case META_DRAW_GRADIENT:
3774 case META_DRAW_GTK_ARROW:
3775 case META_DRAW_GTK_BOX:
3776 case META_DRAW_GTK_VLINE:
3777 break;
3778
3779 case META_DRAW_ICON:
3780 if (info->mini_icon &&
3781 width <= gdk_pixbuf_get_width (info->mini_icon) &&
3782 height <= gdk_pixbuf_get_height (info->mini_icon))
3783 pixbuf = scale_and_alpha_pixbuf (info->mini_icon,
3784 op->data.icon.alpha_spec,
3785 op->data.icon.fill_type,
3786 width, height,
3787 FALSE, FALSE);
3788 else if (info->icon)
3789 pixbuf = scale_and_alpha_pixbuf (info->icon,
3790 op->data.icon.alpha_spec,
3791 op->data.icon.fill_type,
3792 width, height,
3793 FALSE, FALSE);
3794 break;
3795
3796 case META_DRAW_TITLE:
3797 break;
3798
3799 case META_DRAW_OP_LIST:
3800 break;
3801
3802 case META_DRAW_TILE:
3803 break;
3804 }
3805
3806 return pixbuf;
3807}
3808
3809static cairo_surface_t *
3810draw_op_as_surface (const MetaDrawOp *op,
3811 GtkStyleContext *style,
3812 const MetaDrawInfo *info,
3813 gdouble width,
3814 gdouble height)
3815{
3816 cairo_surface_t *surface;
3817
3818 surface = NULL;
3819
3820 switch (op->type)
3821 {
3822 case META_DRAW_IMAGE:
3823 {
3824 if (op->data.image.colorize_spec)
3825 {
3826 GdkRGBA color;
3827
3828 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.image.colorize_spec,
3829 style, &color);
3830
3831 if (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf == NULL ||
3832 op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixel != GDK_COLOR_RGB (color))
3833 {
3834 if (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf)
3835 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf));
3836
3837 /* const cast here */
3838 ((MetaDrawOp*)op)->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf =
3839 colorize_pixbuf (op->data.image.pixbuf,
3840 &color);
3841 ((MetaDrawOp*)op)->data.image.colorize_cache_pixel =
3842 GDK_COLOR_RGB (color);
3843 }
3844
3845 if (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf)
3846 {
3847 surface = get_surface_from_pixbuf (op->data.image.colorize_cache_pixbuf,
3848 op->data.image.fill_type,
3849 width, height,
3850 op->data.image.vertical_stripes,
3851 op->data.image.horizontal_stripes);
3852 }
3853 }
3854 else
3855 {
3856 surface = get_surface_from_pixbuf (op->data.image.pixbuf,
3857 op->data.image.fill_type,
3858 width, height,
3859 op->data.image.vertical_stripes,
3860 op->data.image.horizontal_stripes);
3861 }
3862 break;
3863 }
3864
3865 case META_DRAW_ICON:
3866 if (info->mini_icon &&
3867 width <= gdk_pixbuf_get_width (info->mini_icon) &&
3868 height <= gdk_pixbuf_get_height (info->mini_icon))
3869 surface = get_surface_from_pixbuf (info->mini_icon, op->data.icon.fill_type,
3870 width, height, FALSE, FALSE);
3871 else if (info->icon)
3872 surface = get_surface_from_pixbuf (info->icon, op->data.icon.fill_type,
3873 width, height, FALSE, FALSE);
3874 break;
3875
3876 case META_DRAW_TINT:
3877 case META_DRAW_LINE:
3878 case META_DRAW_RECTANGLE:
3879 case META_DRAW_ARC:
3880 case META_DRAW_CLIP:
3881 case META_DRAW_GRADIENT:
3882 case META_DRAW_GTK_ARROW:
3883 case META_DRAW_GTK_BOX:
3884 case META_DRAW_GTK_VLINE:
3885 case META_DRAW_TITLE:
3886 case META_DRAW_OP_LIST:
3887 case META_DRAW_TILE:
3888 break;
3889
3890 default:
3891 break;
3892 }
3893
3894 return surface;
3895}
3896
3897static void
3898fill_env (MetaPositionExprEnv *env,
3899 const MetaDrawInfo *info,
3900 MetaRectangle logical_region)
3901{
3902 /* FIXME this stuff could be raised into draw_op_list_draw() probably
3903 */
3904 env->rect = logical_region;
3905 env->object_width = -1;
3906 env->object_height = -1;
3907 if (info->fgeom)
3908 {
3909 env->left_width = info->fgeom->borders.visible.left;
3910 env->right_width = info->fgeom->borders.visible.right;
3911 env->top_height = info->fgeom->borders.visible.top;
3912 env->bottom_height = info->fgeom->borders.visible.bottom;
3913 env->frame_x_center = info->fgeom->width / 2 - logical_region.x;
3914 env->frame_y_center = info->fgeom->height / 2 - logical_region.y;
3915 }
3916 else
3917 {
3918 env->left_width = 0;
3919 env->right_width = 0;
3920 env->top_height = 0;
3921 env->bottom_height = 0;
3922 env->frame_x_center = 0;
3923 env->frame_y_center = 0;
3924 }
3925
3926 env->mini_icon_width = info->mini_icon ? gdk_pixbuf_get_width (info->mini_icon) : 0;
3927 env->mini_icon_height = info->mini_icon ? gdk_pixbuf_get_height (info->mini_icon) : 0;
3928 env->icon_width = info->icon ? gdk_pixbuf_get_width (info->icon) : 0;
3929 env->icon_height = info->icon ? gdk_pixbuf_get_height (info->icon) : 0;
3930
3931 env->title_width = info->title_layout_width;
3932 env->title_height = info->title_layout_height;
3933 env->theme = meta_current_theme;
3934}
3935
3936/* This code was originally rendering anti-aliased using X primitives, and
3937 * now has been switched to draw anti-aliased using cairo. In general, the
3938 * closest correspondence between X rendering and cairo rendering is given
3939 * by offsetting the geometry by 0.5 pixels in both directions before rendering
3940 * with cairo. This is because X samples at the upper left corner of the
3941 * pixel while cairo averages over the entire pixel. However, in the cases
3942 * where the X rendering was an exact rectangle with no "jaggies"
3943 * we need to be a bit careful about applying the offset. We want to produce
3944 * the exact same pixel-aligned rectangle, rather than a rectangle with
3945 * fuzz around the edges.
3946 */
3947static void
3948meta_draw_op_draw_with_env (const MetaDrawOp *op,
3949 GtkStyleContext *style_gtk,
3950 cairo_t *cr,
3951 const MetaDrawInfo *info,
3952 MetaRectangle rect,
3953 MetaPositionExprEnv *env)
3954{
3955 GdkRGBA color;
3956
3957 cairo_save (cr);
3958 gtk_style_context_save (style_gtk);
3959
3960 cairo_set_line_width (cr, 1.0);
3961
3962 switch (op->type)
3963 {
3964 case META_DRAW_LINE:
3965 {
3966 int x1, x2, y1, y2;
3967
3968 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.line.color_spec, style_gtk, &color);
3969 gdk_cairo_set_source_rgba (cr, &color);
3970
3971 if (op->data.line.width > 0)
3972 cairo_set_line_width (cr, op->data.line.width);
3973
3974 if (op->data.line.dash_on_length > 0 &&
3975 op->data.line.dash_off_length > 0)
3976 {
3977 double dash_list[2];
3978 dash_list[0] = op->data.line.dash_on_length;
3979 dash_list[1] = op->data.line.dash_off_length;
3980 cairo_set_dash (cr, dash_list, 2, 0);
3981 }
3982
3983 x1 = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.line.x1, env);
3984 y1 = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.line.y1, env);
3985
3986 if (!op->data.line.x2 &&
3987 !op->data.line.y2 &&
3988 op->data.line.width==0)
3989 {
3990 cairo_rectangle (cr, x1, y1, 1, 1);
3991 cairo_fill (cr);
3992 }
3993 else
3994 {
3995 if (op->data.line.x2)
3996 x2 = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.line.x2, env);
3997 else
3998 x2 = x1;
3999
4000 if (op->data.line.y2)
4001 y2 = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.line.y2, env);
4002 else
4003 y2 = y1;
4004
4005 /* This is one of the cases where we are matching the exact
4006 * pixel aligned rectangle produced by X; for zero-width lines
4007 * the generic algorithm produces the right result so we don't
4008 * need to handle them here.
4009 */
4010 if ((y1 == y2 || x1 == x2) && op->data.line.width != 0)
4011 {
4012 double offset = op->data.line.width % 2 ? .5 : 0;
4013
4014 if (y1 == y2)
4015 {
4016 cairo_move_to (cr, x1, y1 + offset);
4017 cairo_line_to (cr, x2, y2 + offset);
4018 }
4019 else
4020 {
4021 cairo_move_to (cr, x1 + offset, y1);
4022 cairo_line_to (cr, x2 + offset, y2);
4023 }
4024 }
4025 else
4026 {
4027 /* zero-width lines include both end-points in X, unlike wide lines */
4028 if (op->data.line.width == 0)
4029 cairo_set_line_cap (cr, CAIRO_LINE_CAP_SQUARE);
4030
4031 cairo_move_to (cr, x1 + .5, y1 + .5);
4032 cairo_line_to (cr, x2 + .5, y2 + .5);
4033 }
4034 cairo_stroke (cr);
4035 }
4036 }
4037 break;
4038
4039 case META_DRAW_RECTANGLE:
4040 {
4041 int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4042
4043 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.rectangle.color_spec, style_gtk, &color);
4044 gdk_cairo_set_source_rgba (cr, &color);
4045
4046 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.rectangle.x, env);
4047 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.rectangle.y, env);
4048 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.rectangle.width, env);
4049 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.rectangle.height, env);
4050
4051 /* Filled and stroked rectangles are the other cases
4052 * we pixel-align to X rasterization
4053 */
4054 if (op->data.rectangle.filled)
4055 {
4056 cairo_rectangle (cr, rx, ry, rwidth, rheight);
4057 cairo_fill (cr);
4058 }
4059 else
4060 {
4061 cairo_rectangle (cr, rx + .5, ry + .5, rwidth, rheight);
4062 cairo_stroke (cr);
4063 }
4064 }
4065 break;
4066
4067 case META_DRAW_ARC:
4068 {
4069 int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4070 double start_angle, end_angle;
4071 double center_x, center_y;
4072
4073 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.arc.color_spec, style_gtk, &color);
4074 gdk_cairo_set_source_rgba (cr, &color);
4075
4076 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.arc.x, env);
4077 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.arc.y, env);
4078 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.arc.width, env);
4079 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.arc.height, env);
4080
4081 start_angle = op->data.arc.start_angle * (M_PI / 180.)
4082 - (.5 * M_PI); /* start at 12 instead of 3 oclock */
4083 end_angle = start_angle + op->data.arc.extent_angle * (M_PI / 180.);
4084 center_x = rx + (double)rwidth / 2. + .5;
4085 center_y = ry + (double)rheight / 2. + .5;
4086
4087 cairo_save (cr);
4088
4089 cairo_translate (cr, center_x, center_y);
4090 cairo_scale (cr, (double)rwidth / 2., (double)rheight / 2.);
4091
4092 if (op->data.arc.extent_angle >= 0)
4093 cairo_arc (cr, 0, 0, 1, start_angle, end_angle);
4094 else
4095 cairo_arc_negative (cr, 0, 0, 1, start_angle, end_angle);
4096
4097 cairo_restore (cr);
4098
4099 if (op->data.arc.filled)
4100 {
4101 cairo_line_to (cr, center_x, center_y);
4102 cairo_fill (cr);
4103 }
4104 else
4105 cairo_stroke (cr);
4106 }
4107 break;
4108
4109 case META_DRAW_CLIP:
4110 break;
4111
4112 case META_DRAW_TINT:
4113 {
4114 int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4115 gboolean needs_alpha;
4116
4117 needs_alpha = op->data.tint.alpha_spec &&
4118 (op->data.tint.alpha_spec->n_alphas > 1 ||
4119 op->data.tint.alpha_spec->alphas[0] != 0xff);
4120
4121 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.tint.x, env);
4122 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.tint.y, env);
4123 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.tint.width, env);
4124 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.tint.height, env);
4125
4126 if (!needs_alpha)
4127 {
4128 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.tint.color_spec, style_gtk, &color);
4129 gdk_cairo_set_source_rgba (cr, &color);
4130
4131 cairo_rectangle (cr, rx, ry, rwidth, rheight);
4132 cairo_fill (cr);
4133 }
4134 else
4135 {
4136 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
4137
4138 pixbuf = draw_op_as_pixbuf (op, style_gtk, info,
4139 rwidth, rheight);
4140
4141 if (pixbuf)
4142 {
4143 gdk_cairo_set_source_pixbuf (cr, pixbuf, rx, ry);
4144 cairo_paint (cr);
4145
4146 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (pixbuf));
4147 }
4148 }
4149 }
4150 break;
4151
4152 case META_DRAW_GRADIENT:
4153 {
4154 int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4155
4156 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.gradient.x, env);
4157 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.gradient.y, env);
4158 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.gradient.width, env);
4159 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.gradient.height, env);
4160
4161 meta_gradient_spec_render (op->data.gradient.gradient_spec,
4162 op->data.gradient.alpha_spec,
4163 cr, style_gtk, rx, ry, rwidth, rheight);
4164 }
4165 break;
4166
4167 case META_DRAW_IMAGE:
4168 {
4169 gint scale;
4170 gdouble rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4171 cairo_surface_t *surface;
4172
4173 scale = gdk_window_get_scale_factor (gdk_get_default_root_window ());
4174 cairo_scale (cr, 1.0 / scale, 1.0 / scale);
4175
4176 if (op->data.image.pixbuf)
4177 {
4178 env->object_width = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (op->data.image.pixbuf) / scale;
4179 env->object_height = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (op->data.image.pixbuf) / scale;
4180 }
4181
4182 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.image.width, env) * scale;
4183 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.image.height, env) * scale;
4184
4185 surface = draw_op_as_surface (op, style_gtk, info, rwidth, rheight);
4186
4187 if (surface)
4188 {
4189 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.image.x, env) * scale;
4190 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.image.y, env) * scale;
4191
4192 cairo_set_source_surface (cr, surface, rx, ry);
4193
4194 if (op->data.image.alpha_spec)
4195 {
4196 cairo_pattern_t *pattern;
4197
4198 cairo_translate (cr, rx, ry);
4199 cairo_scale (cr, rwidth, rheight);
4200
4201 pattern = meta_alpha_gradient_spec_get_mask (op->data.image.alpha_spec);
4202 cairo_mask (cr, pattern);
4203
4204 cairo_pattern_destroy (pattern);
4205 }
4206 else
4207 {
4208 cairo_paint (cr);
4209 }
4210
4211 cairo_surface_destroy (surface);
4212 }
4213 }
4214 break;
4215
4216 case META_DRAW_GTK_ARROW:
4217 {
4218 int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4219
4220 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.gtk_arrow.x, env);
4221 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.gtk_arrow.y, env);
4222 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.gtk_arrow.width, env);
4223 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.gtk_arrow.height, env);
4224
4225 double size = MAX(rwidth, rheight), angle = 0;
4226
4227 switch (op->data.gtk_arrow.arrow)
4228 {
4229 case GTK_ARROW_UP:
4230 angle = 0;
4231 break;
4232 case GTK_ARROW_RIGHT:
4233 angle = M_PI / 2;
4234 break;
4235 case GTK_ARROW_DOWN:
4236 angle = M_PI;
4237 break;
4238 case GTK_ARROW_LEFT:
4239 angle = 3 * M_PI / 2;
4240 break;
4241 case GTK_ARROW_NONE:
4242 return;
4243 }
4244
4245 gtk_style_context_set_state (style_gtk, op->data.gtk_arrow.state);
4246 gtk_render_arrow (style_gtk, cr, angle, rx, ry, size);
4247 }
4248 break;
4249
4250 case META_DRAW_GTK_BOX:
4251 {
4252 int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4253
4254 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.gtk_box.x, env);
4255 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.gtk_box.y, env);
4256 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.gtk_box.width, env);
4257 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.gtk_box.height, env);
4258
4259 gtk_style_context_set_state (style_gtk, op->data.gtk_box.state);
4260 gtk_render_background (style_gtk, cr, rx, ry, rwidth, rheight);
4261 gtk_render_frame (style_gtk, cr, rx, ry, rwidth, rheight);
4262 }
4263 break;
4264
4265 case META_DRAW_GTK_VLINE:
4266 {
4267 int rx, ry1, ry2;
4268
4269 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.gtk_vline.x, env);
4270 ry1 = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.gtk_vline.y1, env);
4271 ry2 = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.gtk_vline.y2, env);
4272
4273 gtk_style_context_set_state (style_gtk, op->data.gtk_vline.state);
4274 gtk_render_line (style_gtk, cr, rx, ry1, rx, ry2);
4275 }
4276 break;
4277
4278 case META_DRAW_ICON:
4279 {
4280 gint scale;
4281 gdouble rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4282 cairo_surface_t *surface;
4283
4284 scale = gdk_window_get_scale_factor (gdk_get_default_root_window ());
4285 cairo_scale (cr, 1.0 / scale, 1.0 / scale);
4286
4287 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.icon.width, env) * scale;
4288 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.icon.height, env) * scale;
4289
4290 surface = draw_op_as_surface (op, style_gtk, info, rwidth, rheight);
4291
4292 if (surface)
4293 {
4294 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.icon.x, env) * scale;
4295 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.icon.y, env) * scale;
4296
4297 cairo_set_source_surface (cr, surface, rx, ry);
4298
4299 if (op->data.icon.alpha_spec)
4300 {
4301 cairo_pattern_t *pattern;
4302
4303 cairo_translate (cr, rx, ry);
4304 cairo_scale (cr, rwidth, rheight);
4305
4306 pattern = meta_alpha_gradient_spec_get_mask (op->data.icon.alpha_spec);
4307 cairo_mask (cr, pattern);
4308
4309 cairo_pattern_destroy (pattern);
4310 }
4311 else
4312 {
4313 cairo_paint (cr);
4314 }
4315
4316 cairo_surface_destroy (surface);
4317 }
4318 }
4319 break;
4320
4321 case META_DRAW_TITLE:
4322 if (info->title_layout)
4323 {
4324 int rx, ry;
4325 PangoRectangle ink_rect, logical_rect;
4326
4327 meta_color_spec_render (op->data.title.color_spec, style_gtk, &color);
4328 gdk_cairo_set_source_rgba (cr, &color);
4329
4330 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.title.x, env);
4331 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.title.y, env);
4332
4333 if (op->data.title.ellipsize_width)
4334 {
4335 int ellipsize_width;
4336 int right_bearing;
4337
4338 ellipsize_width = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.title.ellipsize_width, env);
4339 /* HACK: parse_x_position_unchecked adds in env->rect.x, subtract out again */
4340 ellipsize_width -= env->rect.x;
4341
4342 pango_layout_set_width (info->title_layout, -1);
4343 pango_layout_get_pixel_extents (info->title_layout,
4344 &ink_rect, &logical_rect);
4345
4346 /* Pango's idea of ellipsization is with respect to the logical rect.
4347 * correct for this, by reducing the ellipsization width by the overflow
4348 * of the un-ellipsized text on the right... it's always the visual
4349 * right we want regardless of bidi, since since the X we pass in to
4350 * cairo_move_to() is always the left edge of the line.
4351 */
4352 right_bearing = (ink_rect.x + ink_rect.width) - (logical_rect.x + logical_rect.width);
4353 right_bearing = MAX (right_bearing, 0);
4354
4355 ellipsize_width -= right_bearing;
4356 ellipsize_width = MAX (ellipsize_width, 0);
4357
4358 /* Only ellipsizing when necessary is a performance optimization -
4359 * pango_layout_set_width() will force a relayout if it isn't the
4360 * same as the current width of -1.
4361 */
4362 if (ellipsize_width < logical_rect.width)
4363 pango_layout_set_width (info->title_layout, PANGO_SCALE * ellipsize_width);
4364 }
4365 else if (rx - env->rect.x + env->title_width >= env->rect.width)
4366 {
4367 const double alpha_margin = 30.0;
4368 int text_space = env->rect.x + env->rect.width -
4369 (rx - env->rect.x) - env->right_width;
4370
4371 double startalpha = 1.0 - (alpha_margin/((double)text_space));
4372
4373 cairo_pattern_t *linpat;
4374 linpat = cairo_pattern_create_linear (rx, ry, text_space,
4375 env->title_height);
4376 cairo_pattern_add_color_stop_rgba (linpat, 0, color.red,
4377 color.green,
4378 color.blue,
4379 color.alpha);
4380 cairo_pattern_add_color_stop_rgba (linpat, startalpha,
4381 color.red,
4382 color.green,
4383 color.blue,
4384 color.alpha);
4385 cairo_pattern_add_color_stop_rgba (linpat, 1, color.red,
4386 color.green,
4387 color.blue, 0);
4388 cairo_set_source(cr, linpat);
4389 cairo_pattern_destroy(linpat);
4390 }
4391
4392 cairo_move_to (cr, rx, ry);
4393 pango_cairo_show_layout (cr, info->title_layout);
4394
4395 /* Remove any ellipsization we might have set; will short-circuit
4396 * if the width is already -1 */
4397 pango_layout_set_width (info->title_layout, -1);
4398 }
4399 break;
4400
4401 case META_DRAW_OP_LIST:
4402 {
4403 MetaRectangle d_rect;
4404
4405 d_rect.x = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.op_list.x, env);
4406 d_rect.y = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.op_list.y, env);
4407 d_rect.width = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.op_list.width, env);
4408 d_rect.height = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.op_list.height, env);
4409
4410 meta_draw_op_list_draw_with_style (op->data.op_list.op_list,
4411 style_gtk,
4412 cr,
4413 info, d_rect);
4414 }
4415 break;
4416
4417 case META_DRAW_TILE:
4418 {
4419 int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
4420 int tile_xoffset, tile_yoffset;
4421 MetaRectangle tile;
4422
4423 rx = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.tile.x, env);
4424 ry = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.tile.y, env);
4425 rwidth = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.tile.width, env);
4426 rheight = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.tile.height, env);
4427
4428 cairo_save (cr);
4429
4430 cairo_rectangle (cr, rx, ry, rwidth, rheight);
4431 cairo_clip (cr);
4432
4433 tile_xoffset = parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.tile.tile_xoffset, env);
4434 tile_yoffset = parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.tile.tile_yoffset, env);
4435 /* tile offset should not include x/y */
4436 tile_xoffset -= rect.x;
4437 tile_yoffset -= rect.y;
4438
4439 tile.width = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.tile.tile_width, env);
4440 tile.height = parse_size_unchecked (op->data.tile.tile_height, env);
4441
4442 tile.x = rx - tile_xoffset;
4443
4444 while (tile.x < (rx + rwidth))
4445 {
4446 tile.y = ry - tile_yoffset;
4447 while (tile.y < (ry + rheight))
4448 {
4449 meta_draw_op_list_draw_with_style (op->data.tile.op_list,
4450 style_gtk, cr, info,
4451 tile);
4452
4453 tile.y += tile.height;
4454 }
4455
4456 tile.x += tile.width;
4457 }
4458 cairo_restore (cr);
4459 }
4460 break;
4461 }
4462
4463 cairo_restore (cr);
4464 gtk_style_context_restore (style_gtk);
4465}
4466
4467void
4468meta_draw_op_draw_with_style (const MetaDrawOp *op,
4469 GtkStyleContext *style_gtk,
4470 cairo_t *cr,
4471 const MetaDrawInfo *info,
4472 MetaRectangle logical_region)
4473{
4474 MetaPositionExprEnv env;
4475
4476 fill_env (&env, info, logical_region);
4477
4478 meta_draw_op_draw_with_env (op,
4479 style_gtk,
4480 cr,
4481 info, logical_region,
4482 &env);
4483
4484}

4498
4499MetaDrawOpList*
4500meta_draw_op_list_new (int n_preallocs)
4501{
4502 MetaDrawOpList *op_list;
4503
4504 g_return_val_if_fail (n_preallocs >= 0, NULL);
4505
4506 op_list = g_new (MetaDrawOpList, 1);
4507
4508 op_list->refcount = 1;
4509 op_list->n_allocated = n_preallocs;
4510 op_list->ops = g_new (MetaDrawOp*, op_list->n_allocated);
4511 op_list->n_ops = 0;
4512
4513 return op_list;
4514}
4515
4516void
4517meta_draw_op_list_ref (MetaDrawOpList *op_list)
4518{
4519 g_return_if_fail (op_list != NULL);
4520
4521 op_list->refcount += 1;
4522}
4523
4524void
4525meta_draw_op_list_unref (MetaDrawOpList *op_list)
4526{
4527 g_return_if_fail (op_list != NULL);
4528 g_return_if_fail (op_list->refcount > 0);
4529
4530 op_list->refcount -= 1;
4531
4532 if (op_list->refcount == 0)
4533 {
4534 int i;
4535
4536 for (i = 0; i < op_list->n_ops; i++)
4537 meta_draw_op_free (op_list->ops[i]);
4538
4539 g_free (op_list->ops);
4540
4541 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (op_list);
4542 g_free (op_list);
4543 }
4544}
4545
4546void
4547meta_draw_op_list_draw_with_style (const MetaDrawOpList *op_list,
4548 GtkStyleContext *style_gtk,
4549 cairo_t *cr,
4550 const MetaDrawInfo *info,
4551 MetaRectangle rect)
4552{
4553 /* BOOKMARK */
4554
4555 int i;
4556 MetaPositionExprEnv env;
4557
4558 if (op_list->n_ops == 0)
4559 return;
4560
4561 fill_env (&env, info, rect);
4562
4563 /* FIXME this can be optimized, potentially a lot, by
4564 * compressing multiple ops when possible. For example,
4565 * anything convertible to a pixbuf can be composited
4566 * client-side, and putting a color tint over a pixbuf
4567 * can be done without creating the solid-color pixbuf.
4568 *
4569 * To implement this my plan is to have the idea of a
4570 * compiled draw op (with the string expressions already
4571 * evaluated), we make an array of those, and then fold
4572 * adjacent items when possible.
4573 */
4574
4575 cairo_save (cr);
4576
4577 for (i = 0; i < op_list->n_ops; i++)
4578 {
4579 MetaDrawOp *op = op_list->ops[i];
4580
4581 if (op->type == META_DRAW_CLIP)
4582 {
4583 cairo_restore (cr);
4584
4585 cairo_rectangle (cr,
4586 parse_x_position_unchecked (op->data.clip.x, &env),
4587 parse_y_position_unchecked (op->data.clip.y, &env),
4588 parse_size_unchecked (op->data.clip.width, &env),
4589 parse_size_unchecked (op->data.clip.height, &env));
4590 cairo_clip (cr);
4591
4592 cairo_save (cr);
4593 }
4594 else if (gdk_cairo_get_clip_rectangle (cr, NULL))
4595 {
4596 meta_draw_op_draw_with_env (op, style_gtk, cr, info, rect, &env);
4597 }
4598 }
4599
4600 cairo_restore (cr);
4601}
4602

4604meta_draw_op_list_draw (const MetaDrawOpList *op_list,
4605 GtkWidget *widget,
4606 cairo_t *cr,
4607 const MetaDrawInfo *info,
4608 MetaRectangle rect)
4609
4610{
4611 meta_draw_op_list_draw_with_style (op_list,
4612 gtk_widget_get_style_context (widget),
4613 cr,
4614 info, rect);
4615}
4616
4617void
4618meta_draw_op_list_append (MetaDrawOpList *op_list,
4619 MetaDrawOp *op)
4620{
4621 if (op_list->n_ops == op_list->n_allocated)
4622 {
4623 op_list->n_allocated *= 2;
4624 op_list->ops = g_renew (MetaDrawOp*, op_list->ops, op_list->n_allocated);
4625 }
4626
4627 op_list->ops[op_list->n_ops] = op;
4628 op_list->n_ops += 1;
4629}
4630
4631gboolean
4632meta_draw_op_list_validate (MetaDrawOpList *op_list,
4633 GError **error)
4634{
4635 g_return_val_if_fail (op_list != NULL, FALSE);
4636
4637 /* empty lists are OK, nothing else to check really */
4638
4639 return TRUE;
4640}
4641
4642/* This is not done in validate, since we wouldn't know the name
4643 * of the list to report the error. It might be nice to
4644 * store names inside the list sometime.
4645 */
4646gboolean
4647meta_draw_op_list_contains (MetaDrawOpList *op_list,
4648 MetaDrawOpList *child)
4649{
4650 int i;
4651
4652 /* mmm, huge tree recursion */
4653
4654 for (i = 0; i < op_list->n_ops; i++)
4655 {
4656 if (op_list->ops[i]->type == META_DRAW_OP_LIST)
4657 {
4658 if (op_list->ops[i]->data.op_list.op_list == child)
4659 return TRUE;
4660
4661 if (meta_draw_op_list_contains (op_list->ops[i]->data.op_list.op_list,
4662 child))
4663 return TRUE;
4664 }
4665 else if (op_list->ops[i]->type == META_DRAW_TILE)
4666 {
4667 if (op_list->ops[i]->data.tile.op_list == child)
4668 return TRUE;
4669
4670 if (meta_draw_op_list_contains (op_list->ops[i]->data.tile.op_list,
4671 child))
4672 return TRUE;
4673 }
4674 }
4675
4676 return FALSE;
4677}

4720
4721static void
4722free_button_ops (MetaDrawOpList *op_lists[META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST][META_BUTTON_STATE_LAST])
4723{
4724 int i, j;
4725
4726 for (i = 0; i < META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST; i++)
4727 for (j = 0; j < META_BUTTON_STATE_LAST; j++)
4728 if (op_lists[i][j])
4729 meta_draw_op_list_unref (op_lists[i][j]);
4730}
4731
4732void
4733meta_frame_style_unref (MetaFrameStyle *style)
4734{
4735 g_return_if_fail (style != NULL);
4736 g_return_if_fail (style->refcount > 0);
4737
4738 style->refcount -= 1;
4739
4740 if (style->refcount == 0)
4741 {
4742 int i;
4743
4744 free_button_ops (style->buttons);
4745
4746 for (i = 0; i < META_FRAME_PIECE_LAST; i++)
4747 if (style->pieces[i])
4748 meta_draw_op_list_unref (style->pieces[i]);
4749
4750 if (style->layout)
4751 meta_frame_layout_unref (style->layout);
4752
4753 if (style->window_background_color)
4754 meta_color_spec_free (style->window_background_color);
4755
4756 /* we hold a reference to any parent style */
4757 if (style->parent)
4758 meta_frame_style_unref (style->parent);
4759
4760 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (style);
4761 g_free (style);
4762 }
4763}
4764
4765static MetaButtonState
4766map_button_state (MetaButtonType button_type,
4767 const MetaFrameGeometry *fgeom,
4768 int middle_bg_offset,
4769 MetaButtonState button_states[META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST])
4770{
4771 MetaButtonFunction function = META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_LAST;
4772
4773 switch (button_type)
4774 {
4775 /* First handle functions, which map directly */
4776 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_SHADE:
4777 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_ABOVE:
4778 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_STICK:
4779 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNSHADE:
4780 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNABOVE:
4781 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNSTICK:
4782 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_MENU:
4783 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_APPMENU:
4784 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_MINIMIZE:
4785 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_MAXIMIZE:
4786 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_CLOSE:
4787 return button_states[button_type];
4788
4789 /* Map position buttons to the corresponding function */
4790 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_LEFT_BACKGROUND:
4791 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_SINGLE_BACKGROUND:
4792 if (fgeom->n_right_buttons > 0)
4793 function = fgeom->button_layout.right_buttons[0];
4794 break;
4795 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_RIGHT_BACKGROUND:
4796 if (fgeom->n_right_buttons > 0)
4797 function = fgeom->button_layout.right_buttons[fgeom->n_right_buttons - 1];
4798 break;
4799 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND:
4800 if (middle_bg_offset + 1 < fgeom->n_right_buttons)
4801 function = fgeom->button_layout.right_buttons[middle_bg_offset + 1];
4802 break;
4803 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_LEFT_BACKGROUND:
4804 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_SINGLE_BACKGROUND:
4805 if (fgeom->n_left_buttons > 0)
4806 function = fgeom->button_layout.left_buttons[0];
4807 break;
4808 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_RIGHT_BACKGROUND:
4809 if (fgeom->n_left_buttons > 0)
4810 function = fgeom->button_layout.left_buttons[fgeom->n_left_buttons - 1];
4811 break;
4812 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND:
4813 if (middle_bg_offset + 1 < fgeom->n_left_buttons)
4814 function = fgeom->button_layout.left_buttons[middle_bg_offset + 1];
4815 break;
4816 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST:
4817 break;
4818 }
4819
4820 if (function != META_BUTTON_FUNCTION_LAST)
4821 return button_states[map_button_function_to_type (function)];
4822
4823 return META_BUTTON_STATE_LAST;
4824}
4825
4826static MetaDrawOpList*
4827get_button (MetaFrameStyle *style,
4828 MetaButtonType type,
4829 MetaButtonState state)
4830{
4831 MetaDrawOpList *op_list;
4832 MetaFrameStyle *parent;
4833
4834 parent = style;
4835 op_list = NULL;
4836 while (parent && op_list == NULL)
4837 {
4838 op_list = parent->buttons[type][state];
4839 parent = parent->parent;
4840 }
4841
4842 /* We fall back to the side buttons if we don't have
4843 * single button backgrounds, and to middle button
4844 * backgrounds if we don't have the ones on the sides
4845 */
4846
4847 if (op_list == NULL &&
4848 type == META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_SINGLE_BACKGROUND)
4849 return get_button (style, META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_LEFT_BACKGROUND, state);
4850
4851 if (op_list == NULL &&
4852 type == META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_SINGLE_BACKGROUND)
4853 return get_button (style, META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_RIGHT_BACKGROUND, state);
4854
4855 if (op_list == NULL &&
4856 (type == META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_LEFT_BACKGROUND ||
4857 type == META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_RIGHT_BACKGROUND))
4858 return get_button (style, META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND,
4859 state);
4860
4861 if (op_list == NULL &&
4862 (type == META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_LEFT_BACKGROUND ||
4863 type == META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_RIGHT_BACKGROUND))
4864 return get_button (style, META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND,
4865 state);
4866
4867 /* We fall back to normal if no prelight */
4868 if (op_list == NULL &&
4869 state == META_BUTTON_STATE_PRELIGHT)
4870 return get_button (style, type, META_BUTTON_STATE_NORMAL);
4871
4872 return op_list;
4873}
4874
4875gboolean
4876meta_frame_style_validate (MetaFrameStyle *style,
4877 guint current_theme_version,
4878 GError **error)
4879{
4880 int i, j;
4881
4882 g_return_val_if_fail (style != NULL, FALSE);
4883 g_return_val_if_fail (style->layout != NULL, FALSE);
4884
4885 for (i = 0; i < META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST; i++)
4886 {
4887 /* for now the "positional" buttons are optional */
4888 if (i >= META_BUTTON_TYPE_CLOSE)
4889 {
4890 for (j = 0; j < META_BUTTON_STATE_LAST; j++)
4891 {
4892 if (get_button (style, i, j) == NULL &&
4893 meta_theme_earliest_version_with_button (i) <= current_theme_version
4894 )
4895 {
4896 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
4897 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
4898 _("<button function=\"%s\" state=\"%s\" draw_ops=\"whatever\"/> must be specified for this frame style"),
4899 meta_button_type_to_string (i),
4900 meta_button_state_to_string (j));
4901 return FALSE;
4902 }
4903 }
4904 }
4905 }
4906
4907 return TRUE;
4908}
4909
4910static void
4911get_button_rect (MetaButtonType type,
4912 const MetaFrameGeometry *fgeom,
4913 int middle_background_offset,
4914 GdkRectangle *rect)
4915{
4916 switch (type)
4917 {
4918 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_LEFT_BACKGROUND:
4919 *rect = fgeom->left_left_background;
4920 break;
4921
4922 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND:
4923 *rect = fgeom->left_middle_backgrounds[middle_background_offset];
4924 break;
4925
4926 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_RIGHT_BACKGROUND:
4927 *rect = fgeom->left_right_background;
4928 break;
4929
4930 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_SINGLE_BACKGROUND:
4931 *rect = fgeom->left_single_background;
4932 break;
4933
4934 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_LEFT_BACKGROUND:
4935 *rect = fgeom->right_left_background;
4936 break;
4937
4938 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND:
4939 *rect = fgeom->right_middle_backgrounds[middle_background_offset];
4940 break;
4941
4942 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_RIGHT_BACKGROUND:
4943 *rect = fgeom->right_right_background;
4944 break;
4945
4946 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_SINGLE_BACKGROUND:
4947 *rect = fgeom->right_single_background;
4948 break;
4949
4950 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_CLOSE:
4951 *rect = fgeom->close_rect.visible;
4952 break;
4953
4954 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_SHADE:
4955 *rect = fgeom->shade_rect.visible;
4956 break;
4957
4958 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNSHADE:
4959 *rect = fgeom->unshade_rect.visible;
4960 break;
4961
4962 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_ABOVE:
4963 *rect = fgeom->above_rect.visible;
4964 break;
4965
4966 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNABOVE:
4967 *rect = fgeom->unabove_rect.visible;
4968 break;
4969
4970 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_STICK:
4971 *rect = fgeom->stick_rect.visible;
4972 break;
4973
4974 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_UNSTICK:
4975 *rect = fgeom->unstick_rect.visible;
4976 break;
4977
4978 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_MAXIMIZE:
4979 *rect = fgeom->max_rect.visible;
4980 break;
4981
4982 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_MINIMIZE:
4983 *rect = fgeom->min_rect.visible;
4984 break;
4985
4986 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_MENU:
4987 *rect = fgeom->menu_rect.visible;
4988 break;
4989
4990 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_APPMENU:
4991 *rect = fgeom->appmenu_rect.visible;
4992 break;
4993
4994 case META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST:
4995 g_assert_not_reached ();
4996 break;
4997 }
4998}
4999
5000void
5001meta_frame_style_draw_with_style (MetaFrameStyle *style,
5002 GtkStyleContext *style_gtk,
5003 cairo_t *cr,
5004 const MetaFrameGeometry *fgeom,
5005 int client_width,
5006 int client_height,
5007 PangoLayout *title_layout,
5008 int text_height,
5009 MetaButtonState button_states[META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST],
5010 GdkPixbuf *mini_icon,
5011 GdkPixbuf *icon)
5012{
5013 /* BOOKMARK */
5014 int i, j;
5015 GdkRectangle visible_rect;
5016 GdkRectangle titlebar_rect;
5017 GdkRectangle left_titlebar_edge;
5018 GdkRectangle right_titlebar_edge;
5019 GdkRectangle bottom_titlebar_edge;
5020 GdkRectangle top_titlebar_edge;
5021 GdkRectangle left_edge, right_edge, bottom_edge;
5022 PangoRectangle extents;
5023 MetaDrawInfo draw_info;
5024 const MetaFrameBorders *borders;
5025
5026 borders = &fgeom->borders;
5027
5028 visible_rect.x = borders->invisible.left;
5029 visible_rect.y = borders->invisible.top;
5030 visible_rect.width = fgeom->width - borders->invisible.left - borders->invisible.right;
5031 visible_rect.height = fgeom->height - borders->invisible.top - borders->invisible.bottom;
5032
5033 titlebar_rect.x = visible_rect.x;
5034 titlebar_rect.y = visible_rect.y;
5035 titlebar_rect.width = visible_rect.width;
5036 titlebar_rect.height = borders->visible.top;
5037
5038 left_titlebar_edge.x = titlebar_rect.x;
5039 left_titlebar_edge.y = titlebar_rect.y + fgeom->top_titlebar_edge;
5040 left_titlebar_edge.width = fgeom->left_titlebar_edge;
5041 left_titlebar_edge.height = titlebar_rect.height - fgeom->top_titlebar_edge - fgeom->bottom_titlebar_edge;
5042
5043 right_titlebar_edge.y = left_titlebar_edge.y;
5044 right_titlebar_edge.height = left_titlebar_edge.height;
5045 right_titlebar_edge.width = fgeom->right_titlebar_edge;
5046 right_titlebar_edge.x = titlebar_rect.x + titlebar_rect.width - right_titlebar_edge.width;
5047
5048 top_titlebar_edge.x = titlebar_rect.x;
5049 top_titlebar_edge.y = titlebar_rect.y;
5050 top_titlebar_edge.width = titlebar_rect.width;
5051 top_titlebar_edge.height = fgeom->top_titlebar_edge;
5052
5053 bottom_titlebar_edge.x = titlebar_rect.x;
5054 bottom_titlebar_edge.width = titlebar_rect.width;
5055 bottom_titlebar_edge.height = fgeom->bottom_titlebar_edge;
5056 bottom_titlebar_edge.y = titlebar_rect.y + titlebar_rect.height - bottom_titlebar_edge.height;
5057
5058 left_edge.x = visible_rect.x;
5059 left_edge.y = visible_rect.y + borders->visible.top;
5060 left_edge.width = borders->visible.left;
5061 left_edge.height = visible_rect.height - borders->visible.top - borders->visible.bottom;
5062
5063 right_edge.x = visible_rect.x + visible_rect.width - borders->visible.right;
5064 right_edge.y = visible_rect.y + borders->visible.top;
5065 right_edge.width = borders->visible.right;
5066 right_edge.height = visible_rect.height - borders->visible.top - borders->visible.bottom;
5067
5068 bottom_edge.x = visible_rect.x;
5069 bottom_edge.y = visible_rect.y + visible_rect.height - borders->visible.bottom;
5070 bottom_edge.width = visible_rect.width;
5071 bottom_edge.height = borders->visible.bottom;
5072
5073 if (title_layout)
5074 pango_layout_get_pixel_extents (title_layout,
5075 NULL, &extents);
5076
5077 draw_info.mini_icon = mini_icon;
5078 draw_info.icon = icon;
5079 draw_info.title_layout = title_layout;
5080 draw_info.title_layout_width = title_layout ? extents.width : 0;
5081 draw_info.title_layout_height = title_layout ? extents.height : 0;
5082 draw_info.fgeom = fgeom;
5083
5084 /* The enum is in the order the pieces should be rendered. */
5085 i = 0;
5086 while (i < META_FRAME_PIECE_LAST)
5087 {
5088 GdkRectangle rect;
5089
5090 switch ((MetaFramePiece) i)
5091 {
5092 case META_FRAME_PIECE_ENTIRE_BACKGROUND:
5093 rect = visible_rect;
5094 break;
5095
5096 case META_FRAME_PIECE_TITLEBAR:
5097 rect = titlebar_rect;
5098 break;
5099
5100 case META_FRAME_PIECE_LEFT_TITLEBAR_EDGE:
5101 rect = left_titlebar_edge;
5102 break;
5103
5104 case META_FRAME_PIECE_RIGHT_TITLEBAR_EDGE:
5105 rect = right_titlebar_edge;
5106 break;
5107
5108 case META_FRAME_PIECE_TOP_TITLEBAR_EDGE:
5109 rect = top_titlebar_edge;
5110 break;
5111
5112 case META_FRAME_PIECE_BOTTOM_TITLEBAR_EDGE:
5113 rect = bottom_titlebar_edge;
5114 break;
5115
5116 case META_FRAME_PIECE_TITLEBAR_MIDDLE:
5117 rect.x = left_titlebar_edge.x + left_titlebar_edge.width;
5118 rect.y = top_titlebar_edge.y + top_titlebar_edge.height;
5119 rect.width = titlebar_rect.width - left_titlebar_edge.width -
5120 right_titlebar_edge.width;
5121 rect.height = titlebar_rect.height - top_titlebar_edge.height - bottom_titlebar_edge.height;
5122 break;
5123
5124 case META_FRAME_PIECE_TITLE:
5125 rect = fgeom->title_rect;
5126 break;
5127
5128 case META_FRAME_PIECE_LEFT_EDGE:
5129 rect = left_edge;
5130 break;
5131
5132 case META_FRAME_PIECE_RIGHT_EDGE:
5133 rect = right_edge;
5134 break;
5135
5136 case META_FRAME_PIECE_BOTTOM_EDGE:
5137 rect = bottom_edge;
5138 break;
5139
5140 case META_FRAME_PIECE_OVERLAY:
5141 rect = visible_rect;
5142 break;
5143
5144 case META_FRAME_PIECE_LAST:
5145 g_assert_not_reached ();
5146 break;
5147 }
5148
5149 cairo_save (cr);
5150
5151 gdk_cairo_rectangle (cr, &rect);
5152 cairo_clip (cr);
5153
5154 if (gdk_cairo_get_clip_rectangle (cr, NULL))
5155 {
5156 MetaDrawOpList *op_list;
5157 MetaFrameStyle *parent;
5158
5159 parent = style;
5160 op_list = NULL;
5161 while (parent && op_list == NULL)
5162 {
5163 op_list = parent->pieces[i];
5164 parent = parent->parent;
5165 }
5166
5167 if (op_list)
5168 {
5169 MetaRectangle m_rect;
5170 m_rect = meta_rect (rect.x, rect.y, rect.width, rect.height);
5171 meta_draw_op_list_draw_with_style (op_list,
5172 style_gtk,
5173 cr,
5174 &draw_info,
5175 m_rect);
5176 }
5177 }
5178
5179 cairo_restore (cr);
5180
5181 /* Draw buttons just before overlay */
5182 if ((i + 1) == META_FRAME_PIECE_OVERLAY)
5183 {
5184 MetaDrawOpList *op_list;
5185 int middle_bg_offset;
5186
5187 middle_bg_offset = 0;
5188 j = 0;
5189 while (j < META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST)
5190 {
5191 MetaButtonState button_state;
5192
5193 get_button_rect (j, fgeom, middle_bg_offset, &rect);
5194
5195 button_state = map_button_state (j, fgeom, middle_bg_offset, button_states);
5196 op_list = get_button (style, j, button_state);
5197
5198 if (op_list)
5199 {
5200 cairo_save (cr);
5201 gdk_cairo_rectangle (cr, &rect);
5202 cairo_clip (cr);
5203
5204 if (gdk_cairo_get_clip_rectangle (cr, NULL))
5205 {
5206 MetaRectangle m_rect;
5207
5208 m_rect = meta_rect (rect.x, rect.y,
5209 rect.width, rect.height);
5210
5211 meta_draw_op_list_draw_with_style (op_list,
5212 style_gtk,
5213 cr,
5214 &draw_info,
5215 m_rect);
5216 }
5217
5218 cairo_restore (cr);
5219 }
5220
5221 /* MIDDLE_BACKGROUND type may get drawn more than once */
5222 if ((j == META_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND ||
5223 j == META_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT_MIDDLE_BACKGROUND) &&
5224 middle_bg_offset < MAX_MIDDLE_BACKGROUNDS)
5225 {
5226 ++middle_bg_offset;
5227 }
5228 else
5229 {
5230 middle_bg_offset = 0;
5231 ++j;
5232 }
5233 }
5234 }
5235
5236 ++i;
5237 }
5238}

5276
5277static void
5278free_focus_styles (MetaFrameStyle *focus_styles[META_FRAME_FOCUS_LAST])
5279{
5280 int i;
5281
5282 for (i = 0; i < META_FRAME_FOCUS_LAST; i++)
5283 if (focus_styles[i])
5284 meta_frame_style_unref (focus_styles[i]);
5285}
5286
5287void
5288meta_frame_style_set_ref (MetaFrameStyleSet *style_set)
5289{
5290 g_return_if_fail (style_set != NULL);
5291
5292 style_set->refcount += 1;
5293}
5294
5295void
5296meta_frame_style_set_unref (MetaFrameStyleSet *style_set)
5297{
5298 g_return_if_fail (style_set != NULL);
5299 g_return_if_fail (style_set->refcount > 0);
5300
5301 style_set->refcount -= 1;
5302
5303 if (style_set->refcount == 0)
5304 {
5305 int i;
5306
5307 for (i = 0; i < META_FRAME_RESIZE_LAST; i++)
5308 {
5309 free_focus_styles (style_set->normal_styles[i]);
5310 free_focus_styles (style_set->shaded_styles[i]);
5311 }
5312
5313 free_focus_styles (style_set->maximized_styles);
5314 free_focus_styles (style_set->tiled_left_styles);
5315 free_focus_styles (style_set->tiled_right_styles);
5316 free_focus_styles (style_set->maximized_and_shaded_styles);
5317 free_focus_styles (style_set->tiled_left_and_shaded_styles);
5318 free_focus_styles (style_set->tiled_right_and_shaded_styles);
5319
5320 if (style_set->parent)
5321 meta_frame_style_set_unref (style_set->parent);
5322
5323 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (style_set);
5324 g_free (style_set);
5325 }
5326}
5327
5328static MetaFrameStyle*
5329get_style (MetaFrameStyleSet *style_set,
5330 MetaFrameState state,
5331 MetaFrameResize resize,
5332 MetaFrameFocus focus)
5333{
5334 MetaFrameStyle *style;
5335
5336 style = NULL;
5337
5338 switch (state)
5339 {
5340 case META_FRAME_STATE_NORMAL:
5341 case META_FRAME_STATE_SHADED:
5342 {
5343 if (state == META_FRAME_STATE_SHADED)
5344 style = style_set->shaded_styles[resize][focus];
5345 else
5346 style = style_set->normal_styles[resize][focus];
5347
5348 /* Try parent if we failed here */
5349 if (style == NULL && style_set->parent)
5350 style = get_style (style_set->parent, state, resize, focus);
5351
5352 /* Allow people to omit the vert/horz/none resize modes */
5353 if (style == NULL &&
5354 resize != META_FRAME_RESIZE_BOTH)
5355 style = get_style (style_set, state, META_FRAME_RESIZE_BOTH, focus);
5356 }
5357 break;
5358 default:
5359 {
5360 MetaFrameStyle **styles;
5361
5362 styles = NULL;
5363
5364 switch (state)
5365 {
5366 case META_FRAME_STATE_MAXIMIZED:
5367 styles = style_set->maximized_styles;
5368 break;
5369 case META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_LEFT:
5370 styles = style_set->tiled_left_styles;
5371 break;
5372 case META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_RIGHT:
5373 styles = style_set->tiled_right_styles;
5374 break;
5375 case META_FRAME_STATE_MAXIMIZED_AND_SHADED:
5376 styles = style_set->maximized_and_shaded_styles;
5377 break;
5378 case META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_LEFT_AND_SHADED:
5379 styles = style_set->tiled_left_and_shaded_styles;
5380 break;
5381 case META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_RIGHT_AND_SHADED:
5382 styles = style_set->tiled_right_and_shaded_styles;
5383 break;
5384 case META_FRAME_STATE_NORMAL:
5385 case META_FRAME_STATE_SHADED:
5386 case META_FRAME_STATE_LAST:
5387 g_assert_not_reached ();
5388 break;
5389 }
5390
5391 style = styles[focus];
5392
5393 /* Tiled states are optional, try falling back to non-tiled states */
5394 if (style == NULL)
5395 {
5396 if (state == META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_LEFT ||
5397 state == META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_RIGHT)
5398 style = get_style (style_set, META_FRAME_STATE_NORMAL,
5399 resize, focus);
5400 else if (state == META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_LEFT_AND_SHADED ||
5401 state == META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_RIGHT_AND_SHADED)
5402 style = get_style (style_set, META_FRAME_STATE_SHADED,
5403 resize, focus);
5404 }
5405
5406 /* Try parent if we failed here */
5407 if (style == NULL && style_set->parent)
5408 style = get_style (style_set->parent, state, resize, focus);
5409 }
5410 }
5411
5412 return style;
5413}
5414
5415static gboolean
5416check_state (MetaFrameStyleSet *style_set,
5417 MetaFrameState state,
5418 GError **error)
5419{
5420 int i;
5421
5422 for (i = 0; i < META_FRAME_FOCUS_LAST; i++)
5423 {
5424 if (get_style (style_set, state,
5425 META_FRAME_RESIZE_NONE, i) == NULL)
5426 {
5427 /* Translators: This error occurs when a <frame> tag is missing
5428 * in theme XML. The "<frame ...>" is intended as a noun phrase,
5429 * and the "missing" qualifies it. You should translate "whatever".
5430 */
5431 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
5432 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5433 _("Missing <frame state=\"%s\" resize=\"%s\" focus=\"%s\" style=\"whatever\"/>"),
5434 meta_frame_state_to_string (state),
5435 meta_frame_resize_to_string (META_FRAME_RESIZE_NONE),
5436 meta_frame_focus_to_string (i));
5437 return FALSE;
5438 }
5439 }
5440
5441 return TRUE;
5442}
5443
5444gboolean
5445meta_frame_style_set_validate (MetaFrameStyleSet *style_set,
5446 GError **error)
5447{
5448 int i, j;
5449
5450 g_return_val_if_fail (style_set != NULL, FALSE);
5451
5452 for (i = 0; i < META_FRAME_RESIZE_LAST; i++)
5453 for (j = 0; j < META_FRAME_FOCUS_LAST; j++)
5454 if (get_style (style_set, META_FRAME_STATE_NORMAL, i, j) == NULL)
5455 {
5456 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR,
5457 META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5458 _("Missing <frame state=\"%s\" resize=\"%s\" focus=\"%s\" style=\"whatever\"/>"),
5459 meta_frame_state_to_string (META_FRAME_STATE_NORMAL),
5460 meta_frame_resize_to_string (i),
5461 meta_frame_focus_to_string (j));
5462 return FALSE;
5463 }
5464
5465 if (!check_state (style_set, META_FRAME_STATE_SHADED, error))
5466 return FALSE;
5467
5468 if (!check_state (style_set, META_FRAME_STATE_MAXIMIZED, error))
5469 return FALSE;
5470
5471 if (!check_state (style_set, META_FRAME_STATE_MAXIMIZED_AND_SHADED, error))
5472 return FALSE;
5473
5474 return TRUE;
5475}
5476
5477MetaTheme*
5478meta_theme_get_current (void)
5479{
5480 return meta_current_theme;
5481}
5482
5483void
5484meta_theme_set_current (const char *name,
5485 gboolean force_reload)
5486{
5487 MetaTheme *new_theme;
5488 GError *err;
5489
5490 meta_topic (META_DEBUG_THEMES, "Setting current theme to \"%s\"\n", name);
5491
5492 if (!force_reload &&
5493 meta_current_theme &&
5494 strcmp (name, meta_current_theme->name) == 0)
5495 return;
5496
5497 err = NULL;
5498 new_theme = meta_theme_load (name, &err);
5499
5500 if (new_theme == NULL)
5501 {
5502 meta_warning (_("Failed to load theme \"%s\": %s\n"),
5503 name, err->message);
5504 g_error_free (err);
5505 }
5506 else
5507 {
5508 if (meta_current_theme)
5509 meta_theme_free (meta_current_theme);
5510
5511 meta_current_theme = new_theme;
5512
5513 meta_topic (META_DEBUG_THEMES, "New theme is \"%s\"\n", meta_current_theme->name);
5514 }
5515}
5516
5517MetaTheme*
5518meta_theme_new (void)
5519{
5520 MetaTheme *theme;
5521
5522 theme = g_new0 (MetaTheme, 1);
5523
5524 theme->images_by_filename =
5525 g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash,
5526 g_str_equal,
5527 g_free,
5528 g_object_unref);
5529
5530 theme->layouts_by_name =
5531 g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash,
5532 g_str_equal,
5533 g_free,
5534 (GDestroyNotify) meta_frame_layout_unref);
5535
5536 theme->draw_op_lists_by_name =
5537 g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash,
5538 g_str_equal,
5539 g_free,
5540 (GDestroyNotify) meta_draw_op_list_unref);
5541
5542 theme->styles_by_name =
5543 g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash,
5544 g_str_equal,
5545 g_free,
5546 (GDestroyNotify) meta_frame_style_unref);
5547
5548 theme->style_sets_by_name =
5549 g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash,
5550 g_str_equal,
5551 g_free,
5552 (GDestroyNotify) meta_frame_style_set_unref);
5553
5554 /* Create our variable quarks so we can look up variables without
5555 having to strcmp for the names */
5556 theme->quark_width = g_quark_from_static_string ("width");
5557 theme->quark_height = g_quark_from_static_string ("height");
5558 theme->quark_object_width = g_quark_from_static_string ("object_width");
5559 theme->quark_object_height = g_quark_from_static_string ("object_height");
5560 theme->quark_left_width = g_quark_from_static_string ("left_width");
5561 theme->quark_right_width = g_quark_from_static_string ("right_width");
5562 theme->quark_top_height = g_quark_from_static_string ("top_height");
5563 theme->quark_bottom_height = g_quark_from_static_string ("bottom_height");
5564 theme->quark_mini_icon_width = g_quark_from_static_string ("mini_icon_width");
5565 theme->quark_mini_icon_height = g_quark_from_static_string ("mini_icon_height");
5566 theme->quark_icon_width = g_quark_from_static_string ("icon_width");
5567 theme->quark_icon_height = g_quark_from_static_string ("icon_height");
5568 theme->quark_title_width = g_quark_from_static_string ("title_width");
5569 theme->quark_title_height = g_quark_from_static_string ("title_height");
5570 theme->quark_frame_x_center = g_quark_from_static_string ("frame_x_center");
5571 theme->quark_frame_y_center = g_quark_from_static_string ("frame_y_center");
5572 return theme;
5573}
5574
5575void
5576meta_theme_free (MetaTheme *theme)
5577{
5578 int i;
5579
5580 g_return_if_fail (theme != NULL);
5581
5582 g_free (theme->name);
5583 g_free (theme->dirname);
5584 g_free (theme->filename);
5585 g_free (theme->readable_name);
5586 g_free (theme->date);
5587 g_free (theme->description);
5588 g_free (theme->author);
5589 g_free (theme->copyright);
5590
5591 /* be more careful when destroying the theme hash tables,
5592 since they are only constructed as needed, and may be NULL. */
5593 if (theme->integer_constants)
5594 g_hash_table_destroy (theme->integer_constants);
5595 if (theme->images_by_filename)
5596 g_hash_table_destroy (theme->images_by_filename);
5597 if (theme->layouts_by_name)
5598 g_hash_table_destroy (theme->layouts_by_name);
5599 if (theme->draw_op_lists_by_name)
5600 g_hash_table_destroy (theme->draw_op_lists_by_name);
5601 if (theme->styles_by_name)
5602 g_hash_table_destroy (theme->styles_by_name);
5603 if (theme->style_sets_by_name)
5604 g_hash_table_destroy (theme->style_sets_by_name);
5605
5606 for (i = 0; i < META_FRAME_TYPE_LAST; i++)
5607 if (theme->style_sets_by_type[i])
5608 meta_frame_style_set_unref (theme->style_sets_by_type[i]);
5609
5610 DEBUG_FILL_STRUCT (theme);
5611 g_free (theme);
5612}
5613
5614gboolean
5615meta_theme_validate (MetaTheme *theme,
5616 GError **error)
5617{
5618 int i;
5619
5620 g_return_val_if_fail (theme != NULL, FALSE);
5621
5622 /* FIXME what else should be checked? */
5623
5624 g_assert (theme->name);
5625
5626 if (theme->readable_name == NULL)
5627 {
5628 /* Translators: This error means that a necessary XML tag (whose name
5629 * is given in angle brackets) was not found in a given theme (whose
5630 * name is given second, in quotation marks).
5631 */
5632 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5633 _("No <%s> set for theme \"%s\""), "name", theme->name);
5634 return FALSE;
5635 }
5636
5637 if (theme->author == NULL)
5638 {
5639 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5640 _("No <%s> set for theme \"%s\""), "author", theme->name);
5641 return FALSE;
5642 }
5643
5644 if (theme->date == NULL)
5645 {
5646 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5647 _("No <%s> set for theme \"%s\""), "date", theme->name);
5648 return FALSE;
5649 }
5650
5651 if (theme->description == NULL)
5652 {
5653 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5654 _("No <%s> set for theme \"%s\""), "description", theme->name);
5655 return FALSE;
5656 }
5657
5658 if (theme->copyright == NULL)
5659 {
5660 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5661 _("No <%s> set for theme \"%s\""), "copyright", theme->name);
5662 return FALSE;
5663 }
5664
5665 for (i = 0; i < (int)META_FRAME_TYPE_LAST; i++)
5666 if (i != (int)META_FRAME_TYPE_ATTACHED && theme->style_sets_by_type[i] == NULL)
5667 {
5668 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
5669 _("No frame style set for window type \"%s\" in theme \"%s\", add a <window type=\"%s\" style_set=\"whatever\"/> element"),
5670 meta_frame_type_to_string (i),
5671 theme->name,
5672 meta_frame_type_to_string (i));
5673
5674 return FALSE;
5675 }
5676
5677 return TRUE;
5678}
5679
5680GdkPixbuf*
5681meta_theme_load_image (MetaTheme *theme,
5682 const char *filename,
5683 guint size_of_theme_icons,
5684 GError **error)
5685{
5686 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
5687 int scale;
5688
5689 pixbuf = g_hash_table_lookup (theme->images_by_filename,
5690 filename);
5691
5692 scale = gdk_window_get_scale_factor (gdk_get_default_root_window ());
5693
5694 if (pixbuf == NULL)
5695 {
5696
5697 if (g_str_has_prefix (filename, "theme:") &&
5698 META_THEME_ALLOWS (theme, META_THEME_IMAGES_FROM_ICON_THEMES))
5699 {
5700 pixbuf = gtk_icon_theme_load_icon_for_scale (
5701 gtk_icon_theme_get_default (),
5702 filename+6,
5703 size_of_theme_icons,
5704 scale,
5705 0,
5706 error);
5707 if (pixbuf == NULL) return NULL;
5708 }
5709 else
5710 {
5711 char *full_path;
5712 full_path = g_build_filename (theme->dirname, filename, NULL);
5713
5714 gint width, height;
5715
5716 if (gdk_pixbuf_get_file_info (full_path, &width, &height) == NULL)
5717 {
5718 g_free (full_path);
5719 return NULL;
5720 }
5721
5722 width *= scale;
5723 height *= scale;
5724
5725 pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new_from_file_at_size (full_path, width, height, error);
5726
5727 if (pixbuf == NULL)
5728 {
5729 g_free (full_path);
5730 return NULL;
5731 }
5732
5733 g_free (full_path);
5734 }
5735 g_hash_table_replace (theme->images_by_filename,
5736 g_strdup (filename),
5737 pixbuf);
5738 }
5739
5740 g_assert (pixbuf);
5741
5742 g_object_ref (G_OBJECT (pixbuf));
5743
5744 return pixbuf;
5745}
5746
5747static MetaFrameStyle*
5748theme_get_style (MetaTheme *theme,
5749 MetaFrameType type,
5750 MetaFrameFlags flags)
5751{
5752 MetaFrameState state;
5753 MetaFrameResize resize;
5754 MetaFrameFocus focus;
5755 MetaFrameStyle *style;
5756 MetaFrameStyleSet *style_set;
5757
5758 style_set = theme->style_sets_by_type[type];
5759
5760 if (style_set == NULL && type == META_FRAME_TYPE_ATTACHED)
5761 style_set = theme->style_sets_by_type[META_FRAME_TYPE_BORDER];
5762
5763 /* Right now the parser forces a style set for all other types,
5764 * but this fallback code is here in case I take that out.
5765 */
5766 if (style_set == NULL)
5767 style_set = theme->style_sets_by_type[META_FRAME_TYPE_NORMAL];
5768 if (style_set == NULL)
5769 return NULL;
5770
5771 switch (flags & (META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED | META_FRAME_SHADED | META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT | META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT))
5772 {
5773 case 0:
5774 state = META_FRAME_STATE_NORMAL;
5775 break;
5776 case META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED:
5777 state = META_FRAME_STATE_MAXIMIZED;
5778 break;
5779 case META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT:
5780 case (META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED | META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT):
5781 state = META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_LEFT;
5782 break;
5783 case META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT:
5784 case (META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED | META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT):
5785 state = META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_RIGHT;
5786 break;
5787 case META_FRAME_SHADED:
5788 state = META_FRAME_STATE_SHADED;
5789 break;
5790 case (META_FRAME_MAXIMIZED | META_FRAME_SHADED):
5791 state = META_FRAME_STATE_MAXIMIZED_AND_SHADED;
5792 break;
5793 case (META_FRAME_TILED_LEFT | META_FRAME_SHADED):
5794 state = META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_LEFT_AND_SHADED;
5795 break;
5796 case (META_FRAME_TILED_RIGHT | META_FRAME_SHADED):
5797 state = META_FRAME_STATE_TILED_RIGHT_AND_SHADED;
5798 break;
5799 default:
5800 g_assert_not_reached ();
5801 state = META_FRAME_STATE_LAST; /* compiler */
5802 break;
5803 }
5804
5805 switch (flags & (META_FRAME_ALLOWS_VERTICAL_RESIZE | META_FRAME_ALLOWS_HORIZONTAL_RESIZE))
5806 {
5807 case 0:
5808 resize = META_FRAME_RESIZE_NONE;
5809 break;
5810 case META_FRAME_ALLOWS_VERTICAL_RESIZE:
5811 resize = META_FRAME_RESIZE_VERTICAL;
5812 break;
5813 case META_FRAME_ALLOWS_HORIZONTAL_RESIZE:
5814 resize = META_FRAME_RESIZE_HORIZONTAL;
5815 break;
5816 case (META_FRAME_ALLOWS_VERTICAL_RESIZE | META_FRAME_ALLOWS_HORIZONTAL_RESIZE):
5817 resize = META_FRAME_RESIZE_BOTH;
5818 break;
5819 default:
5820 g_assert_not_reached ();
5821 resize = META_FRAME_RESIZE_LAST; /* compiler */
5822 break;
5823 }
5824
5825 /* re invert the styles used for focus/unfocussed while flashing a frame */
5826 if (((flags & META_FRAME_HAS_FOCUS) && !(flags & META_FRAME_IS_FLASHING))
5827 || (!(flags & META_FRAME_HAS_FOCUS) && (flags & META_FRAME_IS_FLASHING)))
5828 focus = META_FRAME_FOCUS_YES;
5829 else
5830 focus = META_FRAME_FOCUS_NO;
5831
5832 style = get_style (style_set, state, resize, focus);
5833
5834 return style;
5835}
5836
5837MetaFrameStyle*
5838meta_theme_get_frame_style (MetaTheme *theme,
5839 MetaFrameType type,
5840 MetaFrameFlags flags)
5841{
5842 MetaFrameStyle *style;
5843
5844 g_return_val_if_fail (type < META_FRAME_TYPE_LAST, NULL);
5845
5846 style = theme_get_style (theme, type, flags);
5847
5848 return style;
5849}

5851double
5852meta_theme_get_title_scale (MetaTheme *theme,
5853 MetaFrameType type,
5854 MetaFrameFlags flags)
5855{
5856 MetaFrameStyle *style;
5857
5858 g_return_val_if_fail (type < META_FRAME_TYPE_LAST, 1.0);
5859
5860 style = theme_get_style (theme, type, flags);
5861
5862 /* Parser is not supposed to allow this currently */
5863 if (style == NULL)
5864 return 1.0;
5865
5866 return style->layout->title_scale;
5867}

5869void
5870meta_theme_draw_frame (MetaTheme *theme,
5871 GtkStyleContext *style_gtk,
5872 cairo_t *cr,
5873 MetaFrameType type,
5874 MetaFrameFlags flags,
5875 int client_width,
5876 int client_height,
5877 PangoLayout *title_layout,
5878 int text_height,
5879 const MetaButtonLayout *button_layout,
5880 MetaButtonState button_states[META_BUTTON_TYPE_LAST],
5881 GdkPixbuf *mini_icon,
5882 GdkPixbuf *icon)
5883{

5885 MetaFrameStyle *style;
5886
5887 g_return_if_fail (type < META_FRAME_TYPE_LAST);
5888

5890
5891 /* Parser is not supposed to allow this currently */
5892 if (style == NULL)
5893 return;
5894
5895 meta_frame_layout_calc_geometry (style->layout,
5896 text_height,
5897 flags,
5898 client_width, client_height,
5899 button_layout,
5900 &fgeom,
5901 theme);
5902
5903 meta_frame_style_draw_with_style (style,
5904 style_gtk,
5905 cr,
5906 &fgeom,
5907 client_width, client_height,
5908 title_layout,
5909 text_height,
5910 button_states,
5911 mini_icon, icon);

6076static gboolean
6077first_uppercase (const char *str)
6078{
6079 return g_ascii_isupper (*str);
6080}
6081
6082gboolean
6083meta_theme_define_int_constant (MetaTheme *theme,
6084 const char *name,
6085 int value,
6086 GError **error)
6087{
6088 if (theme->integer_constants == NULL)
6089 theme->integer_constants = g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash,
6090 g_str_equal,
6091 g_free,
6092 NULL);
6093
6094 if (!first_uppercase (name))
6095 {
6096 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
6097 _("User-defined constants must begin with a capital letter; \"%s\" does not"),
6098 name);
6099 return FALSE;
6100 }
6101
6102 if (g_hash_table_lookup_extended (theme->integer_constants, name, NULL, NULL))
6103 {
6104 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
6105 _("Constant \"%s\" has already been defined"),
6106 name);
6107
6108 return FALSE;
6109 }
6110
6111 g_hash_table_insert (theme->integer_constants,
6112 g_strdup (name),
6113 GINT_TO_POINTER (value));
6114
6115 return TRUE;
6116}
6117
6118gboolean
6119meta_theme_lookup_int_constant (MetaTheme *theme,
6120 const char *name,
6121 int *value)
6122{
6123 gpointer old_value;
6124
6125 *value = 0;
6126
6127 if (theme->integer_constants == NULL)
6128 return FALSE;
6129
6130 if (g_hash_table_lookup_extended (theme->integer_constants,
6131 name, NULL, &old_value))
6132 {
6133 *value = GPOINTER_TO_INT (old_value);
6134 return TRUE;
6135 }
6136 else
6137 {
6138 return FALSE;
6139 }
6140}
6141
6142gboolean
6143meta_theme_define_float_constant (MetaTheme *theme,
6144 const char *name,
6145 double value,
6146 GError **error)
6147{
6148 double *d;
6149
6150 if (theme->float_constants == NULL)
6151 theme->float_constants = g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash,
6152 g_str_equal,
6153 g_free,
6154 g_free);
6155
6156 if (!first_uppercase (name))
6157 {
6158 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
6159 _("User-defined constants must begin with a capital letter; \"%s\" does not"),
6160 name);
6161 return FALSE;
6162 }
6163
6164 if (g_hash_table_lookup_extended (theme->float_constants, name, NULL, NULL))
6165 {
6166 g_set_error (error, META_THEME_ERROR, META_THEME_ERROR_FAILED,
6167 _("Constant \"%s\" has already been defined"),
6168 name);
6169
6170 return FALSE;
6171 }
6172
6173 d = g_new (double, 1);
6174 *d = value;
6175
6176 g_hash_table_insert (theme->float_constants,
6177 g_strdup (name), d);
6178
6179 return TRUE;
6180}
6181
6182gboolean
6183meta_theme_lookup_float_constant (MetaTheme *theme,
6184 const char *name,
6185 double *value)
6186{
6187 double *d;
6188
6189 *value = 0.0;
6190
6191 if (theme->float_constants == NULL)
6192 return FALSE;
6193
6194 d = g_hash_table_lookup (theme->float_constants, name);
6195
6196 if (d)
6197 {
6198 *value = *d;
6199 return TRUE;
6200 }
6201 else
6202 {
6203 return FALSE;
6204 }
6205}

6276
6277PangoFontDescription*
6278meta_gtk_widget_get_font_desc (GtkWidget *widget,
6279 double scale,
6280 const PangoFontDescription *override)
6281{
6282 PangoFontDescription *font_desc;
6283 gint font_size;
6284
6285 GtkStyleContext *style = gtk_widget_get_style_context (widget);
6286 GtkStateFlags state = gtk_widget_get_state_flags (widget);
6287 gtk_style_context_get(style, state, GTK_STYLE_PROPERTY_FONT, &font_desc, NULL);
6288
6289 if (override)
6290 pango_font_description_merge (font_desc, override, TRUE);
6291
6292 font_size = pango_font_description_get_size (font_desc);
6293 pango_font_description_set_size (font_desc,
6294 MAX ((gint) (scale * (double) font_size), 1));
6295
6296 return font_desc;
6297}
6298
6306int
6307meta_pango_font_desc_get_text_height (const PangoFontDescription *font_desc,
6308 PangoContext *context)
6309{
6310 PangoFontMetrics *metrics;
6311 PangoLanguage *lang;
6312 int retval;
6313
6314 lang = pango_context_get_language (context);
6315 metrics = pango_context_get_metrics (context, font_desc, lang);
6316
6317 retval = PANGO_PIXELS (pango_font_metrics_get_ascent (metrics) +
6318 pango_font_metrics_get_descent (metrics));
6319
6320 pango_font_metrics_unref (metrics);
6321
6322 return retval;
6323}
