6907
6917static void
6918gtk_style_shade (GdkRGBA *a,
6919 GdkRGBA *b,
6920 gdouble k)
6921{
6922 gdouble red;
6923 gdouble green;
6924 gdouble blue;
6925
6926 red = a->red;
6927 green = a->green;
6928 blue = a->blue;
6929
6930 rgb_to_hls (&red, &green, &blue);
6931
6932 green *= k;
6933 if (green > 1.0)
6934 green = 1.0;
6935 else if (green < 0.0)
6936 green = 0.0;
6937
6938 blue *= k;
6939 if (blue > 1.0)
6940 blue = 1.0;
6941 else if (blue < 0.0)
6942 blue = 0.0;
6943
6944 hls_to_rgb (&red, &green, &blue);
6945
6946 b->red = red;
6947 b->green = green;
6948 b->blue = blue;
6949}
6950
6958static void
6959rgb_to_hls (gdouble *r,
6960 gdouble *g,
6961 gdouble *b)
6962{
6963 gdouble min;
6964 gdouble max;
6965 gdouble red;
6966 gdouble green;
6967 gdouble blue;
6968 gdouble h, l, s;
6969 gdouble delta;
6970
6971 red = *r;
6972 green = *g;
6973 blue = *b;
6974
6975 if (red > green)
6976 {
6977 if (red > blue)
6978 max = red;
6979 else
6980 max = blue;
6981
6982 if (green < blue)
6983 min = green;
6984 else
6985 min = blue;
6986 }
6987 else
6988 {
6989 if (green > blue)
6990 max = green;
6991 else
6992 max = blue;
6993
6994 if (red < blue)
6995 min = red;
6996 else
6997 min = blue;
6998 }
6999
7000 l = (max + min) / 2;
7001 s = 0;
7002 h = 0;
7003
7004 if (max != min)
7005 {
7006 if (l <= 0.5)
7007 s = (max - min) / (max + min);
7008 else
7009 s = (max - min) / (2 - max - min);
7010
7011 delta = max -min;
7012 if (red == max)
7013 h = (green - blue) / delta;
7014 else if (green == max)
7015 h = 2 + (blue - red) / delta;
7016 else if (blue == max)
7017 h = 4 + (red - green) / delta;
7018
7019 h *= 60;
7020 if (h < 0.0)
7021 h += 360;
7022 }
7023
7024 *r = h;
7025 *g = l;
7026 *b = s;
7027}
7028
7036static void
7037hls_to_rgb (gdouble *h,
7038 gdouble *l,
7039 gdouble *s)
7040{
7041 gdouble hue;
7042 gdouble lightness;
7043 gdouble saturation;
7044 gdouble m1, m2;
7045 gdouble r, g, b;
7046
7047 lightness = *l;
7048 saturation = *s;
7049
7050 if (lightness <= 0.5)
7051 m2 = lightness * (1 + saturation);
7052 else
7053 m2 = lightness + saturation - lightness * saturation;
7054 m1 = 2 * lightness - m2;
7055
7056 if (saturation == 0)
7057 {
7058 *h = lightness;
7059 *l = lightness;
7060 *s = lightness;
7061 }
7062 else
7063 {
7064 hue = *h + 120;
7065 while (hue > 360)
7066 hue -= 360;
7067 while (hue < 0)
7068 hue += 360;
7069
7070 if (hue < 60)
7071 r = m1 + (m2 - m1) * hue / 60;
7072 else if (hue < 180)
7073 r = m2;
7074 else if (hue < 240)
7075 r = m1 + (m2 - m1) * (240 - hue) / 60;
7076 else
7077 r = m1;
7078
7079 hue = *h;
7080 while (hue > 360)
7081 hue -= 360;
7082 while (hue < 0)
7083 hue += 360;
7084
7085 if (hue < 60)
7086 g = m1 + (m2 - m1) * hue / 60;
7087 else if (hue < 180)
7088 g = m2;
7089 else if (hue < 240)
7090 g = m1 + (m2 - m1) * (240 - hue) / 60;
7091 else
7092 g = m1;
7093
7094 hue = *h - 120;
7095 while (hue > 360)
7096 hue -= 360;
7097 while (hue < 0)
7098 hue += 360;
7099
7100 if (hue < 60)
7101 b = m1 + (m2 - m1) * hue / 60;
7102 else if (hue < 180)
7103 b = m2;
7104 else if (hue < 240)
7105 b = m1 + (m2 - m1) * (240 - hue) / 60;
7106 else
7107 b = m1;
7108
7109 *h = r;
7110 *l = g;
7111 *s = b;
7112 }
7113}
7114
7115#if 0
7116/* These are some functions I'm saving to use in optimizing
7117 * MetaDrawOpList, namely to pre-composite pixbufs on client side
7118 * prior to rendering to the server
7119 */
7120static void
7121draw_bg_solid_composite (const MetaTextureSpec *bg,
7122 const MetaTextureSpec *fg,
7123 double alpha,
7124 GtkWidget *widget,
7125 GdkDrawable *drawable,
7126 const GdkRectangle *clip,
7127 MetaTextureDrawMode mode,
7128 double xalign,
7129 double yalign,
7130 int x,
7131 int y,
7132 int width,
7133 int height)
7134{
7135 GdkColor bg_color;
7136
7137 g_assert (bg->type == META_TEXTURE_SOLID);
7138 g_assert (fg->type != META_TEXTURE_COMPOSITE);
7139 g_assert (fg->type != META_TEXTURE_SHAPE_LIST);
7140
7141 meta_color_spec_render (bg->data.solid.color_spec,
7142 widget,
7143 &bg_color);
7144
7145 switch (fg->type)
7146 {
7147 case META_TEXTURE_SOLID:
7148 {
7149 GdkColor fg_color;
7150
7151 meta_color_spec_render (fg->data.solid.color_spec,
7152 widget,
7153 &fg_color);
7154
7155 color_composite (&bg_color, &fg_color,
7156 alpha, &fg_color);
7157
7158 draw_color_rectangle (widget, drawable, &fg_color, clip,
7159 x, y, width, height);
7160 }
7161 break;
7162
7163 case META_TEXTURE_GRADIENT:
7164 /* FIXME I think we could just composite all the colors in
7165 * the gradient prior to generating the gradient?
7166 */
7167 /* FALL THRU */
7168 case META_TEXTURE_IMAGE:
7169 {
7170 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
7171 GdkPixbuf *composited;
7172
7173 pixbuf = meta_texture_spec_render (fg, widget, mode, 255,
7174 width, height);
7175
7176 if (pixbuf == NULL)
7177 return;
7178
7179 composited = gdk_pixbuf_new (GDK_COLORSPACE_RGB,
7180 gdk_pixbuf_get_has_alpha (pixbuf), 8,
7181 gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf),
7182 gdk_pixbuf_get_height (pixbuf));
7183
7184 if (composited == NULL)
7185 {
7186 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (pixbuf));
7187 return;
7188 }
7189
7190 gdk_pixbuf_composite_color (pixbuf,
7191 composited,
7192 0, 0,
7193 gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf),
7194 gdk_pixbuf_get_height (pixbuf),
7195 0.0, 0.0, /* offsets */
7196 1.0, 1.0, /* scale */
7197 GDK_INTERP_BILINEAR,
7198 255 * alpha,
7199 0, 0, /* check offsets */
7200 0, /* check size */
7201 GDK_COLOR_RGB (bg_color),
7202 GDK_COLOR_RGB (bg_color));
7203
7204 /* Need to draw background since pixbuf is not
7205 * necessarily covering the whole thing
7206 */
7207 draw_color_rectangle (widget, drawable, &bg_color, clip,
7208 x, y, width, height);
7209
7210 render_pixbuf_aligned (drawable, clip, composited,
7211 xalign, yalign,
7212 x, y, width, height);
7213
7214 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (pixbuf));
7215 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (composited));
7216 }
7217 break;
7218
7219 case META_TEXTURE_BLANK:
7220 case META_TEXTURE_COMPOSITE:
7221 case META_TEXTURE_SHAPE_LIST:
7222 g_assert_not_reached ();
7223 break;
7224 }
7225}
7226
7227static void
7228draw_bg_gradient_composite (const MetaTextureSpec *bg,
7229 const MetaTextureSpec *fg,
7230 double alpha,
7231 GtkWidget *widget,
7232 GdkDrawable *drawable,
7233 const GdkRectangle *clip,
7234 MetaTextureDrawMode mode,
7235 double xalign,
7236 double yalign,
7237 int x,
7238 int y,
7239 int width,
7240 int height)
7241{
7242 g_assert (bg->type == META_TEXTURE_GRADIENT);
7243 g_assert (fg->type != META_TEXTURE_COMPOSITE);
7244 g_assert (fg->type != META_TEXTURE_SHAPE_LIST);
7245
7246 switch (fg->type)
7247 {
7248 case META_TEXTURE_SOLID:
7249 case META_TEXTURE_GRADIENT:
7250 case META_TEXTURE_IMAGE:
7251 {
7252 GdkPixbuf *bg_pixbuf;
7253 GdkPixbuf *fg_pixbuf;
7254 GdkPixbuf *composited;
7255 int fg_width, fg_height;
7256
7257 bg_pixbuf = meta_texture_spec_render (bg, widget, mode, 255,
7258 width, height);
7259
7260 if (bg_pixbuf == NULL)
7261 return;
7262
7263 fg_pixbuf = meta_texture_spec_render (fg, widget, mode, 255,
7264 width, height);
7265
7266 if (fg_pixbuf == NULL)
7267 {
7268 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (bg_pixbuf));
7269 return;
7270 }
7271
7272 /* gradients always fill the entire target area */
7273 g_assert (gdk_pixbuf_get_width (bg_pixbuf) == width);
7274 g_assert (gdk_pixbuf_get_height (bg_pixbuf) == height);
7275
7276 composited = gdk_pixbuf_new (GDK_COLORSPACE_RGB,
7277 gdk_pixbuf_get_has_alpha (bg_pixbuf), 8,
7278 gdk_pixbuf_get_width (bg_pixbuf),
7279 gdk_pixbuf_get_height (bg_pixbuf));
7280
7281 if (composited == NULL)
7282 {
7283 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (bg_pixbuf));
7284 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (fg_pixbuf));
7285 return;
7286 }
7287
7288 fg_width = gdk_pixbuf_get_width (fg_pixbuf);
7289 fg_height = gdk_pixbuf_get_height (fg_pixbuf);
7290
7291 /* If we wanted to be all cool we could deal with the
7292 * offsets and try to composite only in the clip rectangle,
7293 * but I just don't care enough to figure it out.
7294 */
7295
7296 gdk_pixbuf_composite (fg_pixbuf,
7297 composited,
7298 x + (width - fg_width) * xalign,
7299 y + (height - fg_height) * yalign,
7300 gdk_pixbuf_get_width (fg_pixbuf),
7301 gdk_pixbuf_get_height (fg_pixbuf),
7302 0.0, 0.0, /* offsets */
7303 1.0, 1.0, /* scale */
7304 GDK_INTERP_BILINEAR,
7305 255 * alpha);
7306
7307 gdk_cairo_set_source_pixbuf (cr, composited, x, y);
7308 cairo_paint (cr);
7309
7310 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (bg_pixbuf));
7311 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (fg_pixbuf));
7312 g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (composited));
7313 }
7314 break;
7315

7317 case META_TEXTURE_SHAPE_LIST:
7318 case META_TEXTURE_COMPOSITE:
7319 g_assert_not_reached ();
7320 break;
7321 }
